Sentinel: You better go directly via Shadow Forest Road if you want to go to Klaipeda.{nl}The deep woods are dangerous, so try to stay away if you can.
Man in hiding
Fi... Finally! Has help arrived?{nl}What, it's just a kid? Hey... Are there still Vubbes outside?
Ugh. Go away! Do not talk to me! We'll get caught by the Vubbes!{nl}This is my place so get out of here!
What? Do not lie to me! I can smell the Vubbes from here.{nl}You can't fool an adult! Go away! Do not come near this barrel!
Fi... Finally! Has help arrived?{nl}What, it's just a kid? What are you looking at? Close the lid and just go away!{nl}
What's that paper you're holding? It looks familiar...{nl}Let me see that! What are you doing? Hey, there's an adult speaking to you!
This paper, it's mine! I'm never giving it away again!!{nl}It's.. not something you need - I'll just rip it apart. There.
Sheesh, that's lame...
This is the first sign after all the goddesses disappeared.{nl}Maybe one of these people will be the one to bring the goddesses back.
Soldier Blag
Be warned!{nl}Monsters are attacking, so all citizens must evacuate!{nl}By the way, how come those citizens are in the military zone?{nl}
Ah, so you are the Revelator! I'm sorry, I didn't recognize you.{nl}Monsters are attacking the supply base at the moment.{nl}I need to take some important rations out from the base. Please help me!
It was quiet not too long ago, but now they are coming in groups.{nl}What is happening?
I felt unsafe...{nl}But, I didn't expect they would be coming en masse.
You'll see the 1st supply warehouse as you head up the road.{nl}Please bring some of the remaining supplies.
I wrote down who Sparnas is, in case you need it in the future.{nl}You may not know, but I was a biologist four years ago.
Please pass this report to Luders.{nl}He is probably at the central supply base.
Officer Luders
Ah, you must be the so called Revelator. Nice to meet you.{nl}Is this Blag's report?{nl}
Hmm... Is that so?{nl}They just destroyed the supplies and ran away. Even if Chupacabras have wings, I am sure they can't do something like this.{nl}
It is little less.{nl}I am sorry, but please bring us Moody's report from the crooked roat in Amzina.
I feel safe since Luders is here.
Soldier York
Siaulambs are breaking the norms.{nl}I am in a panic myself, so I don't know what to do.{nl}Luders will not stand for this... What should we do?
Do you think the problem would be resolved by just defeating Sparnas?
Thanks to your help, I think I can get myself together.{nl}But... this kind of thing will happen again right? Then what should I do...?
Sparnas? We don't have an answer for that.{nl}It just appears from the sky without any signs, destroys all supplies and then dissappears.{nl}I get a headache just hearing its cries.
The place I just talked about is the 2nd supply warehouse.{nl}It is depressing to think how these kinds of things will be recurring in the future.

Take it. I made some bait from old grains in the supplies.{nl}I will lure him up there, so you stay here.{nl}Sparnas will definitely appear at one of these two places. Do not miss it, and destroy it for sure.{nl}
We may not get a second chance if we don't defeat it this time.{nl}They're not idiots.
I heard the sound of fighting so I came in a hurry. Have you defeated it?{nl}I only spotted Siaulambs.{nl}Well done. You have performed a meritorious deed.
Adjutant Paulina
We should recover the stolen items.{nl}They can't say they are the soldiers of the kingdom if they just get attacked.
We should recover the stolen items.{nl}We can't call ourselves soldiers if we just do nothing.{nl}
I feel so upset having to endure this all the time.{nl}Reinforcements should be coming soon, but what can we expect from such an imcompetent kingdom?
Adjutant Volda
Thank you very much, but you must be late for other things.{nl}Besides we can't just sit here and wait. We plan to keep attacking.
Secret Guardian
The goddess already foretold this.{nl}No beings can escape from her vision.
Liaison Officer Niels
Hello.{nl}Have you seen an old man who lost his way?{nl}His name is Jonas.{nl}
You haven't seen him?{nl}Where is he now then..? He is old and weak.
Jonas is a descendant of the family that has been protecting this Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our lab team so please take good care of him.
Archivist Jonas
Our family has been waiting for you for a long time.{nl}Now is the time to give you the thing that we have been protecting for a long time.
It is good to hear that Jonas has regained his conciousness.{nl}You are the person who lifted the light signal, right?{nl}
Ahylas came after seeing the light.{nl}Meet him downstairs.
We haven't heard any news from Kepeck for a long time after we sent him supplies.{nl}We don't have enough people to form a search team, so please help us find him.
Historian Beard
Always be prepared for monster attacks.{nl}Especially in places like here.
Mercenary Mirta
Didn't I already warn you?{nl}Please be careful next time.
Historian Kepeck
Niels must have sent you.{nl}Well, if you are in a hurry, record it yourself and take it back to Niels.
When you go straight on the right road and cross the bridge, you will see the artifacts of the great King Zachariel.{nl}Record them and take the recordings to Niels. He will understand.
So this is Kepeck's record... Mercenary Mirta was looking for this.{nl}I am okay as long as I can confirm their safety. Thank you for your efforts.
Ahylas Jonas
Disciple of Gustas
Have you unlocked the seal of Pagasa Cliff?{nl}It will start now.
Words carved into a rock.
Do not touch or push it.
I was waiting for you.{nl}The next seal is located on the way to Broken Sanctum.
You won't know how eagerly we have waited for this moment.{nl}We really wanted to meet you.
Gustas Jonas
So it's you.{nl}You are much more of a man compared to what I had imagined.
Soldier Alan
You are a new soldier right?{nl}I received a patrolling order, but I guess you can go my behalf.
You're good.{nl}I don't want to go there. I had a horrible experience once.
I'm remembering something...
You know that we are dispatched here to destroy Gaigalas right?{nl}Hey newcomer. Can you take this report to Commander Wallis?
Commander Wallis
How come you brought this report instead of Alan?{nl}Are you a newcomer?
I can return home after we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Ah, I just want to go home.
Wallis is at Three Footsteps.
I don't care how good you are. You are new here.{nl}It is an order. Bring some juice from Kepa Raiders.
Guys these days, they don't have any guts.{nl}I hope you're a good influence to them.
I am sure we will win this battle.{nl}Why? Owls told us that they will help us.
The Kepa Raiders are near Lanutis Falls.{nl}To defeat Gaigalas, we really need that.
Soldier Weisz
Hey, are you taking a break?{nl}Get some oil from Duckeys at Lanvas Garden.
We will lure Gaigalas using Duckey Oil.{nl}Hey newcomer, don't loaf around.
Today will be the last day for Gaigalas.{nl}Are you ready, newcomer?
Next, we will get leather from the Cronewt that lives in Lanvas Garden.{nl}Move fast, soldier.
We will win for sure this time.{nl}The goddesses are on our side.
You are pretty good for a newcomer.{nl}It's disorganized here at the moment, so you can keep those ingredients for now.{nl}
Get to know our soldiers while I make preparations for the battle.{nl}I will call you before we confront Gaigalas.
When we burn the Duckey Oil, Gaigalas will appear after smelling the odor.{nl}Lanvas Garden will be a good place to burn it.
My heart is pounding.{nl}I feel like my spirit is about to leave my body.
Statue of Old Owl
There's no one in this forest. Why are you here?{nl}
Who? Gaigalas?{nl}Defeating it without any assitance will be difficult.
I have seen many deaths here.{nl}I don't want to see any more sacrifices.
I need Kepa Raider juice, and Cronewt leather.
Why do you have that?{nl}Hand it to me and I will make a Fragment of Memory.
With this Fragment of Memory I will revive the memories of our sleeping colleagues.
It will be difficult to defeat it without the Fragment of Memory.{nl}Please bring the horn of Infroholder.
How come you have all these ingredients?
We can calm them if we defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Please go see the Worrying Owl.
The Statue of Worrying Owl
Please wake the sleeping colleagues and help us complete the magic on this day.{nl}With the Fragment of Memory.
They will be satisfied.{nl}I will stand here while remembering our colleagues.
You will find Gaigalas when you go to the entrance of Ishimtini.{nl}Please avenge our fallen soldiers.
I was in an isolated place so I didn't fall asleep.{nl}But, watching it all was painful for me.
My colleagues were attacked while they were trying to help the soldiers.
Some symbols started to show on the body of Jonas after he drank the medicine.
Archaeologist Dezic
I am looking for my assistant named Irene.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can go look for her?
I told her not to get excited even if she finds something.{nl}She did it again.
Thanks.{nl}I will go look for Irene.
Technician Heinen
Much better than I expected.{nl}I want to propose a deal to you.
That barrier... When was it made?{nl}It has been there for quite some time, but I can't remember exactly how long.{nl}
I'm sure that barrier is responsible for the increasing number of monsters lately.{nl}
We don't have many soldiers here.{nl}No one in their right mind would come here in this day and age.{nl}
Rolandas Jonas
No one knows what the great King Zachariel tried to protect.{nl}And I'm sure that we're not the only ones who want to solve that mystery.
Please unleash the seals with this Key of the Great King at the Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}You will know what to do next.
I found Irene, but I don't know how to rescue her.{nl}She is tied at the 2nd Architects' Site in Rodoma, but I can't rescue her myself...
Assistant Irene
I can't move because of the barrier.{nl}Please break the three barriers at the Rodoma Architects' Site.
Not done yet? Damn...
I didn't expect that I would fall into this kind of thing.{nl}Damn, I should not have followed him.
Mercenary Glen
So many researchers are disappearing these days.{nl}I'm trying to find some clues by defeating Saugas. Can you help us?
Saugas distribute rewards equally among themselves.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues there.
Fortunately they are very old.{nl}That means it's not due to monsters.
This is a very dangerous place and many people have gone missing here.{nl}But that is not the main problem here.{nl}
Sometimes when certain people disappear no one else notices.{nl}It's as if all memories of those who disappear are erased. Isn't it strange?{nl}
Please defeat all monsters nearby to prevent anything from happening.{nl}There were reports that the monsters at the 1st Architects' Site had turned violent.
Very good indeed.{nl}We don't have to worry for a while.
Monsters are coming!{nl}They probably found out I was released.
The goddesses sent you?{nl}I never thought that you would protect me.{nl}
Where is that huge scorpion? We are in trouble!
I should go see Dezik.{nl}I hope to see you again in the future.
Someone must have done something strange to the monsters protecting the Mausoleum.{nl}What were they thinking?
Sir, recover your consciousness. Sir!
New Mausoleum Researcher
I lost my important research materials at the Abondoned Old Workplace.{nl}The monsters must have taken them... Should I just give up?
I am so glad I get to see the Mausoleum myself, but the monsters... They are scary.
Thank you so much.{nl}But you should also check the Records Repository.
The entrace to the Mausoleum is hidden somewhere in this gigantic canyon.{nl}And this place is the start of the canyon.
Many experts have come here to conduct research on the Mausoleum.{nl}Maybe we can find some clues about the Medis Diena here.
Why are there so many monsters at the Canyon when there is such little plant life?
What happened to my request? Is it not done yet?
Look closely at the ground.{nl}It may have fallen down.
Only these?{nl}Well, thank you for finding this much at least.{nl}I can just copy again from the beginning.
So Niels has also sent you?{nl}I am not going. I have to research the wild flowers.{nl}
I guess what I saw was a delusion.{nl}I will compensate you for protecting me.{nl}
Yes.{nl}Bring my record from Niels.
Jonas told you to bring his record?{nl}Okay. Would you please also bring him this medicine.{nl}
The medicine will help recover conciousness.{nl}Davio at the right side of the research camp has the medicine.
Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Mausoleum of Zachariel.{nl}He was very healthy before, but these days he is old and weak.{nl}
If Jonas was walking with his maid, then that's after you went outside.{nl}Jonas was found when he was in his dotage and the maid is still missing.
Please take good care of Jonas.{nl}It would be a big problem if he got hurt.
Davio is at the right side of the camp.{nl}I hope the medicine works well.
Finally, I remember everything.{nl}I am the head of the family that protects the Mausoleum... Who are you?{nl}
Revelator. If this is the decision of the goddess, then you must be right.{nl}You have a job to do, so follow me to the light signal place.
I have made Niels and you worry...
I will lead the way and you will handle any monsters we encounter.{nl}I am counting on you.
Now is our chance. Follow me!
I am sure that you are qualified for this.{nl}Goddess Laima has led all these.
I finally found someone to share this sad news with.{nl}I regret not recognizing you sooner due to my senility.
Zachariel told me to share this sad news with the qualified person.{nl}See if you are qualifed for this at the Great King's Eyes.
We have one more responsiblity besides protecting this Mausoleum.{nl}To protect the sad news until the qualified person comes.{nl}
I don't know what that sad news is.{nl}The king has told us to protect it so we are just following his order.
Medicine Dealer
Hmm... Well, there's a mint that only grows at Metos Canyon.{nl}Please bring me that.
Metos Canyon is the best place to wake up your consciousness. Especially for an old man.
That's right. You have some sense.{nl}
Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
Merchant Davio
We brought that old man's medicine. {nl}But we spent a long time getting it. I should charge you more.{nl}
The gold that Lichenclops have in this town will be enough.{nl}Bring those to the pharmacist at Kapas.
This will be enough. Davio sent you right?{nl}To make the medicine effective I need one more ingredient.
To make the medicine, I needed find the cause and it drove me crazy.{nl}The funny thing is that it was the same thing as the magic that was used long ago.{nl}
I heard a rumor that Zachariel erased the memories of all workers after building the Mausoleum.{nl}That's the magic cast on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.
It was so hard to get that old man's medicine.{nl}But, there's nothing that I cannot get.
It will be completed when you melt it in the honey that you brought. Take it.
That medicine works well. Make him swallow it somehow.
It's late.{nl}Did you bring my records?
Go to the Abondoned Workplace.{nl}Some old man is wandering around there. I think it's Jonas.
What is that? It smells like honey alcohol.
I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here anyway?
It's good to hear that they are searching for it.{nl}I left all the supplies and my belogings since monsters were chasing after me.{nl}Can you go find the scattered supplies first?
I don't have anything to tell you as a humble mercenary.{nl}I was okay even on the Medis Diena, I am sure this place is cursed.{nl}
Why do you come here now after such a long time?{nl}Where is Mirta and who are you?
I'm trying to remember something but it keeps fading whenever I get close.
Vaidotas
The smell.. I think the purifying device in the mine is broken.{nl}We better repair it quickly. The people taken away might suffocate.
Do you know the legend of Cunningham?{nl}It's a legend about the great demon sealed here in the Crystal Mine.{nl}For more details, there is a book about it in the miners lounge of 2nd Gallery.{nl}

Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The dream the bishop had and the legend of Cunningham... I feel it might be a sign that something huge is about to happen.{nl}
Only the goddess would know if it is hope or despair.{nl}
The purifier can be easily fixed by anyone but it may be hard to find the parts.{nl}In that case, use the compass that I gave you.{nl}
Well then, I have some things to do so I will meet you in the 3rd Gallery.{nl}I wish for your fortune of war in the name of the goddess.
If you can't repair the purifier, use the compass I gave you.{nl}You'll be able to find a way.
Village Aunt
Did you come to save us? Did you?
Okay! We are going to be okay now!
Village Girl
Please save us. Please..
Please release me. Please..
Mr. Juan
I feel mad whenever I see those Vubbes that ruined my hometown.{nl}That's why I want to help people like you who fight againt the Vubbes.
I would have left already if this wasn't my hometown.{nl}Where on earth have all the Vubbes been hiding before they crawled out?
Pharmacist lady
Thanks for the last time.{nl}Without you, I would have never gotten those ingredients.
Maybe the person that the goddess sent was you.{nl}You are the most merciful person I have ever seen among the revelators.
Soldier Jays
I will protect this village for my dead colleagues.
Even if the world changes, I will never forgive the Vubbes.
Soldier Edgar
These are the rations that we gathered from the east forest.{nl}I will never, ever lose them again. Never.
Thanks to you, I found this much.{nl}I'm so happy.
Knight Commander Uska
Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old rock to me.
You better ask the Bokor Master about this slate.{nl}She lives at the end of Klaipedas Residential Area so go pay her a visit.
Use your time wisely.{nl}No one can know everything about one's own future.
So you finally came.{nl}What did the Bokor Master tell you?
I'm also curious about the girl who cracked the seal.{nl}This is not a seal that can easily be broken.
If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}I can think of a place.{nl}
Miners' Village Mayor
Welcome. Aren't you our town's savior?{nl}
So this revelation is Goddess Laima and we have to collect all these for the Goddess to regain her powers?{nl}That is amazing.
Oh, please do not reveal the fact that the Revelator has been found unless absolutely necessary.{nl}It may only create confusion if the rumors spread.
Ah, you mean the report.{nl}At first, those Siaulagos did something strange to the supplies, but they ran away after a while when Sparnas came.{nl}
I was spotted by those Siaulagos when they were running away, so I engaged in a battle..{nl}Yes.. And as you can see, I lost it. The report, I mean.{nl}Aren't they bastards?
When you find the report, please hand it over to Luders right away.{nl}I feel terrified to think what those bastards did to our supplies.
Yes. After seeing Moody's report, I am confident that they put something in our supplies to lure Sparnas.{nl}Such as Old Grains that birds go crazy on.
The soldiers on patrol found the place where Siaulambs' stolen goods are packed.{nl}How about we steal them for ourselves?{nl}Let's make it known that we're not as weak as they think.{nl}
You should fight fire with fire.{nl}We will keep attacking until they fully realize that they've made a mistake.
We're not going to suffer anymore.{nl}Thanks for your efforts.
It will be Ziedo Pond.{nl}I heard there are many Siaulambs, so be careful.
I have not heard anything else about the bishop's dream.{nl}Sorry, I can't be of much help.
Klaipeda Guard Captain
Go ahead to Klaipeda.{nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda Central Plaza.{nl}I heard the bishop also had a dream about the Goddess... And I think it has to do with that.
Klaipeda Guard
Thank you for making your way here.{nl}If there is this much still left even after Sir Titas handled it himself, can you imagine how it was before?
Mercenary Tobi
Do you want to do a small task for me?{nl}I'm a known face so it will be hard for me to do it myself.
If you don't want to, then you don't have to.{nl}There are plenty of people around who can do this.
Good.{nl}You possess tremendous abilities.
It's definitely worth it.{nl}Even if the King spent all his assets building the Mausoleum, its size is huge.
Hey you. That equipment is not permitted.{nl}Do not leave it lying around.{nl}
Okay. Bring me some kind of evidence that those people are making counterfeits.{nl}Do whatever it takes.
I am looking for the evidence of artifact forgery.{nl}The first thing you must do is gather the equipment necessary for digging.
Of course you should show us your skills.{nl}Defeating Desert Chupacabras or Zinutes will be enough to prove yourself.
Supply Officer
Thank you for your help.{nl}I think this is enough.{nl}
)}{nl}If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble.{nl} If you don't want to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.
Scout
Go back, it's dangerous!{nl}Kepas will soon be marching in.
Oh, you're the Revelator.{nl}It must be fate that we are to fight together. Let me give you some inside scoop.
You mentioned that we need to assemble, right?{nl}Help me find the missing luggage and I'll go as soon as I can.
You haven't found the luggage yet? I can't go back without it.
Thank you. You found it sooner than I expected.{nl}
If you follow the road to the north, you will find the Search Scout.{nl}Good luck.
Laimonas
Have you ever offered worship to the Statue?{nl}If not, I'd really recommend it.
That depends on which Goddess it is.{nl}If you follow the road to the right you will find the Statue of Goddess Zemyna.
I do worry that the monsters might harm the Statue of the Goddess.
Good thing to hear that the Statue is fine.{nl}The monsters know to fear the Goddess.{nl}
Go down the Shadow Forest Road and you should arrive at Klaipeda shortly.{nl}Well then, may be blessings of Goddess be with you
Please do me a favor if you are headed to Klaipeda.{nl}It's not easy to go back and forth from Klaipeda because of the Infro Rocktors nowadays.
Maybe taking care of the Statues will make the Goddesses return sooner...
Follow the road on the left at the camp crossroads.{nl}{-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
)} You'll meet the troops right away.
)} Alright, good job.{nl}You'll arrive at Klaipeda shortly if you follow the Shadow Forest Road.{nl}Don't forget to drop by Sir Uska.
Battle Commander
I will have my men notify the troops to assemble.{nl}You may return to Sir Titas and let him know.
It's nothing difficult.{nl}If you don't want to, I'll let you go to Klaipeda right away.
Search Scout
It sure is a problem.{nl}I didn't know Kepas could grow that big.
Shouldn't Revelators go to Klaipeda instead of here?
I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than to be stationed.
When you see a Statue of Goddess, try offering your worship.{nl}Surely something nice will happen.
This is a dangerous area. What are you doing here?
Thank you for your help.{nl}The Large Kepa appearing here... I must report to Sir Titas about it.
Weird... That is not a type of monster you'd face in a place like this.{nl}It must be hard to just walk around.
Assemble already?{nl}That's tough. There's still a pile of missions.
Even if the Goddess arrived, I will not go until the mission is completed.
Yes. This should be enough.{nl}This is a pill that will restore your stamina instantly. I have enough of it so I will give you this as a gift.{nl}

Stamina is consumed when you move.{nl}You can recover stamina by destroying a Tree Root Crystal or by resting.{nl}But you don't have time for that when you are being chased by monsters.{nl}That's when this pill comes in handy.
I heard the news from my men and was starting to become worried.{nl}All is well if it ended up good.
Klaipeda Resident
)} {nl}When do you think the Goddess is coming back?{nl}Even if I ask the Revelators, all they say is that they must go to Klaipeda...
Are you the Revelator?{nl}You said the Goddess appeared in your dream.{nl}It's what the soldiers were saying.
Trooper
I wonder what the Goddess is doing...
Thank you for making your way here.{nl}I am Uska, the Knight-Commander in charge of Siaulai and Klaipeda.
The bishop also dreamed of revelation.{nl}He said to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine.{nl}
Let me know when you are ready to go to the Crystal Mine.{nl}I'll tell you the location and how to get in.
The Bishop told us to send the Revelator to Crystal Mine.{nl}He said the Goddess told him to do so.{nl}
But the Miners' Village is at war with the Vubbes and entrance is limited to authorized people only.{nl}Aras is the one in charge of Eastern Woods so try talking to him.
Monsters have been around for a long time, but they only started becoming violent four years ago.{nl}The ones that were affected the most would be the plant types. They did not exist before.{nl}
Of course, beasts were no exception.{nl}When the monster that seemed like it was fused with a demon appeared, I thought it was all over.
Knight Aras
Aren't you hurt?{nl}Thank you for getting rid of the Poatas but you're too reckless.
You want to get into the Crystal Mine?{nl}The Miners' Village is currently at war with the Vubbes and it's very dangerous,{nl}so I cannot permit that.
And our troops are in no condition to guard you.{nl}I'm sorry but you have to go back.
If you can't get rid of the Pokubus, you'll have to give up going into the Miners' Village.
Thank you.{nl}Do not worry, I'll keep my promise.
Outpost Sentinel
Other monsters also show up when there are Chupacabras.{nl}Miners' Village is a problem on its own but there are just too many things to pay attention to.
Thank you.{nl}It really helps lift our spirits.
With your abilities, I have one more favor to ask.{nl}Can you help us drive out the Chupacabras in the supply camp too?
The Miners' Village is a problem but out situation here is not so good either. {nl}We have to prepare some measures before the number of monsters increase even more.
Are you done already?{nl}Never seen anyone as fast as you before.
I'm on a mission to find out why the number of monsters in the East woods suddenly increased.{nl}Also, I act as the intermediary in supplying the Miners' Village.{nl}
There are other knights out in Miners' Village but...{nl}To be honest, the battle is taking longer than expected. It would have ended sooner if Sir Aras was there.
Since you're going to help, please get rid of the Giant Gray Chupacabras too.{nl}They are the culprits stealing our supplies.
Giant Gray Chupacabras appear when you kill normal chupacabras.{nl}Well then, thanks for your help.
Thank you.{nl}Now we can finally get to work easily.
Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.
The movement of weavers in the lower area of the stream seems suspicious.{nl}Seems like they're trying to interfere with supplying the Miners' Village.
We might have to give up our current supplies and support ourselves until the next batch of supplies arrive.
Thank you.{nl}With you helping us out like this, we will not be defeated.
The next mission is to find the cause of the increasing number of monsters.{nl}Popolions have a big appetite so I hope we can find a clue.
Miners' Village is already in trouble and if the East Woods is in this situation, {nl}we can't assure the safety of Klaipeda.{nl}We can just hope that Klaipeda is doing well.
Operations officer
Were you sent by Aras?{nl}It's a piece of Vubbe clothing. Hmm... Is that so...
I think the Vubbes of the Miners' Village have made their way into the woods.{nl}Maybe that's the reason behind the sudden increase in monsters too.{nl}
I better ask Sir Aras to search for Vubbes in other areas too.{nl}In the meantime, please take a look at the upper side.
We haven't searched the upper side yet.{nl}Of course, we should be sending troops but I ask for your help as this is an urgent matter.
You saw the Vubbe fighter but missed it?{nl}We also got a report that the Vubbe fighter appeared in the area below.{nl}
First, talk to the search scout in the lower bridge of Bulvjes.{nl}This will become a tedious long term war if we miss the Vubbe fighter.
So the Vubbe Fighter was the reason behind the increase of monsters.{nl}Please find out how many Vubbe Fighters there are.{nl}
Under the circumstances, it makes sense that the monsters are controlled by Vubbe Fighters.{nl}But deep down, you just don't want to believe it.
Following your report, there are no more Vubbe Fighters in these woods.{nl}
Supply Soldier
We need Weaver Claws as a part of supplies to be sent to Miners' Village {nl}but we just don't have time to look for them.{nl}What do we do?
Actually, it doesn't make sense for the supply soldier to get the supplies.{nl}It should have come from Klaipeda.
Thank you.{nl}Unexpected help always feels good.
In fact, everything would have been fine if the Pokubus weren't around.{nl}The Pokubus were running wild and that's why were weren't able to retrieve all the supplies.
I don't know why they suddenly started to prey on the supplies.{nl}Could something be commanding them?
Thank you.{nl}I envy your ability.
Eastern Woods Search Scout
Oh, it's you.{nl}I have heard from the operations officer.{nl}
A Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area.{nl}We got the orders to kill it, but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
I'm just a search scout but it was my first time to see a Vubbe Fighter up close.
Awesome. You got rid of it by yourself.{nl}Go ahead and report to Sir Aras. He'll be very pleased.
You mean you really killed the Vubbe Fighter?{nl}Well then, now we can be relieved since the number of monsters will no longer grow.
Of course. As promised, I will grant your access to the Miners' Village.{nl}Please wait.
If you find any clues, let the Operations Officer in the northern area know about it.
I think the Miners' Village is not in a good situation.{nl}It's too late to move the troops so you go first to support the Miners' Village.
They have low IQ but these monsters build groups and live as a community.{nl}They used to appear only occasionally in the deeper areas of the mines... Could they be expanding their forces?{nl}
Whatever the reason is, Vubbes expanding their territory is a big problem.{nl}Monsters that lose their territory to Vubbes will be forced to make their way into our base.
It's a single road from here on so you'll be able to find the people easily.{nl}
Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for can be found in the Closed Area.
One thing, there's something that keeps bothering me.{nl}A vague feeling of something alien.
Miner
Thank you for saving me.{nl}The revelator has come to save us. It's like a dream.{nl}
The Closed Area?{nl}If you insist on getting in, gather the mysterious stones the Vubbes have.{nl}The walls just open when you touch the crystal clogged wall with it.
I was collecting the supplies to be sent to the Miners' Village, but the monsters stole it all.{nl}
The supply boxes contain dangerous explosives and collecting them is not an easy task.
They couldn't have gone far.{nl}It would have been better if it just exploded on the way.
Mercenary Lint
Thank you again.{nl}I should return to my commander soon. I think I can return to him after I get some more rest.
I knew you would.{nl}One more thing, the ground near the Closed Area is weak so the entrance has been blocked for a long time.{nl}
The kidnapped people are veteran miners so they may know how to get in.{nl}Well then, may the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
It wasn't long ago.{nl}I felt a strange power while performing experiments in the Closed Area.{nl}It was different from the mana that we know but it was very warm.{nl}
But some force did not allow me to approach, as if it had an owner already.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the evidence of salvation.{nl}
Perhaps the evidence of salvation is the force I felt...{nl}That's what I think.
All I see are monsters and we're out of supplies.{nl}I'm also curious how the battle situation is in Miners' Village.
Until I'm assigned a new task, I'm thinking of going back to my duties as a search scout.{nl}Observing the monsters, you know.
The Miners' Village is under siege and entrance is prohibited for civilians.{nl}Remember that we can't guarantee your safety if you do not get my permission.
You have to cheer up.{nl} Even Sir Aras is holding on.
Goddess Zemyna overlooks the earth.{nl}There are rumors that the Goddess has abandoned us but that's nonsense.{nl}Her statue still shines beautifully when you pray to it.
Vubbes suddenly came pouring in from outside of the Siaulai Woods.{nl}That's why the Mining Village located in the middle of it turned to a battlefield.{nl}

And that's why I can't permit entrance to the Miners Village. For safety reasons.{nl}Of course it will be a different story if your skill are good enough to ensure your safety even without the protection of guards.
Gosh, it could have been really dangerous.{nl}That huge thing was hiding so well.
It's very important to study monsters at times like this.{nl}It's like weather forecasts where you try to find out the cause and see what would happen.
I'm sure the leaf bugs in Uoros farm stole it.{nl}They did steal from us once before.
Send my regards to the Guard Captain when you meet him.
In order to test if your skills are good enough to enter the Miners Village,{nl}I need you to help us solve a problem we have.{nl}
First, take back the farm from the Pokubus.{nl}I believe this would be a fairly easy task
There seems to be a gap in the rock where you can insert something.
Let's search the Bulvjes farm first.{nl}But don't chase them or something as it can be dangerous.
It makes me wonder if you're an envoy of the Goddess.{nl}Anyway, the supply camp is located further below the farm.
Vubbes are emerging inside the Mine Gallery so be sure to stay together in groups of five.
Equipment Merchant
Even at times like this, I struggle to find the best items I can. You can't go easy in terms of dealing with your customers.

Monsters attack and steal from people who buy items from me. I think they know I can tell which items are good.{nl}I feel sorry for those who were attacked but it also proves that the items are worth it.
The monsters never raided into Klaipeda but with Sir Uska gone, it's hard to be at ease.{nl}You have you watch out for yourself at times like this.
I want to travel with a single weapon in hand like an adventurer... But it's not that easy.

If you listen to the soldiers, they'll use terms only they can understand and make it sound difficult.{nl}But when I ask a friend who's a soldier, he says it's not like they are talking about anything important.
Be cautious of people who sell weapons from monsters without permit.{nl}They'll try and scam you into to buying useless things or sell you things at ridiculously high prices.
Item Merchant
It's the little things you forget to buy that makes you regret when you travel.{nl}Better buy enough of them when you can.
I feel sorry for those who were injured. Can't we just get along with the monsters?
I'd rather stay safe and at peace with lower sales than have sales go up because of people worrying when the monsters might attack.
I sell things that people need, but I sometimes think it would've been better if I was a healer,{nl}because that way I could be closer to the explorers to help them.
I hear strange howling from the distance. Could it be the sound of the monsters?
People say I'm weird and I talk too much but I don't mind. Even if I'm really weird like they say, that doesn't mean the items I sell are weird.
Blacksmith
Hello.{nl}I can help you repair items but I can't craft new ones because I don't have the materials.{nl}Go on and choose from whatever is available.
Klaipeda resident
It's true these are tough times but everyone is looking out for the soldiers.
Aside from everything else, I want to eat till I'm full.{nl}You need to eat to have strength.
Why have the goddesses disappeared?{nl}Everyone is looking for where they've gone but no one is asking why they've disappeared.
I can't eat, sleep, or move about freely because of those monsters.{nl}In the old days, we used gather herbs or pick fruits in Siaulai Forest you know.
Everyone is talking about the war wherever you go.{nl}Like who and how much people are hurt or who's assigned to where.{nl}All the stories about the war makes me sick!
I heard they will send soldiers who aren't even trained into the nest of monsters.{nl}It might be better to gather the old people and make them soldiers.
My life is just a repetition of worries and anger.{nl}The Goddess should return soon.
There are suddenly many people who dreamed about the revelation.{nl}Could it be a sign that something is about to happen again?{nl}
The Bishop of Klaipeda also dreamed about the Goddess.{nl}Could it be the same dream as with the Revelators?
Mother of Soldier
)} My son has enlisted in the Army.{nl}He said who would, if not him, at such difficult times like this.
)} Monster are growing and the forest is too chaotic for people to live in.{nl}At least, Klaipeda is safe.
)} At least Klaipeda is safe but other cities are in chaos?{nl}Well, putting aside the capital, Fedimian has totally collapsed except for the Sacred Area.
)} It's a good thing that my son accomplished his dream of becoming a solder...{nl}But the monsters are rising and I'm worried he might get hurt.
)} Maybe Klaipeda is where the Goddess has bestowed her blessings.{nl}I hope the blessings will also reach my son who enlisted in the army.
)} My husband used to be a miner and how relieved I am that he isn't anymore.{nl}It would be too dangerous if the monsters raid at times like this wouldn't it?
)} Many refugees came from the fallen town.{nl}Our food supplies are running short but we still have to help each other.
I may not bring in the items with best quality, but isn't having all the items necessary a skill of its own?{nl}I've got to work hard to get through tough times.
I think the best weapons and armor are the ones that you get used to over a long period time.{nl}In order to do so, you must start first by buying good items.
I used to pack my things and go around travelling in the past but I guess that would be difficult now.
Try using a variety of weapons. Eventually, you'll find one that a fits you.
The armors that suit you guarantees your safety.
A single armor piece can mean the difference between life and death. Look around if you have everything you need.
It's free to look around.
Look around and see if you need anything.
Look around carefully. You might find something that can help you.
Sometimes, things that you just look at without any thoughts can actually fit you very well, so take a look and think about it.
You can just look around. Find me anytime you need.
We have enough items so take a look.
You need good weapons and armor to prepare for the monsters. That is what I'm selling.
Items I have for sale are flawless. These are all new.
If you don't prepare the equipment now, you might regret it later, when you're surrounded by monsters. Have a look around when you can.
I've prepared the best items I can find. The prices aren't bad either so look around.
The things I sell are good both in price and quality.
If you have the time, take a look at the items I have for sale.
I hope good items will find good owners.
Yes this was originally a bustling shopping area. But everyone left as it became difficult to live...
I was too busy to afford to talk to the people when they gathered.
A lot of people seem to be coming thanks to Sir Uska's recruitment notice.
There's a lot of preparation for when you go to battle with the monsters.
Times are difficult but I decided not to raise the prices. Have a look.
Monsters mistake things for food and just swallow it. They must be really hungry.
I once encountered a monster in Siauliai Woods. I just stood still and the monster went away...{nl}I guess there are monsters that do not make the first attack on people.
I've heard that some people sell things that are dropped from those who were running away from the monsters. Things I sell are not like that so no need to worry about that.
Everything aside, I do not lie about my items being cheap. The stuff I sell is priced just right.
Feel free to look around anytime.
It can be hard if you don't prepare enough potions.
It's free to look around the things I sell.
How do you continue running a business if you don't make profits?
I thought about moving my business to somewhere else but I had to stay for the people who come to me.
I don't think of making a lot of money. I just need enough to live by.
I think we have to help each other at difficult times like these. I hope I can be of help.
Can I help you? I'll show you what we have prepared.
Please feel free to come back if you need anything.
You don't necessarily have to buy things so feel free to look around
I sold items even before the monsters appeared.
Don't you feel good just looking at the items even if you don't buy them?
You can find me anytime if you want a look at the items I'm selling.
What would it be like to go on an adventure fighting monsters? I was born and raised here so I sometimes wonder how it would be in other areas.
Sometimes when I see the soldiers who protect us from the monsters, I want to give them things for free.{nl}Although it's really not easy for me to do so...
Better were the days when Commander Uska took care of Klaipeda himself.
Isn't there a way to get rid of all the monsters running wild in Siauliai Woods?
I hope some skilled person could drive out all the monsters.
Living in a place where monsters are running wild outside is driving me nuts.{nl}And I can't think of going anywhere else because of the monsters...
I'd wipe out all the monsters if I had the skills.{nl}Why are soldiers leaving the monsters alone?
I am tired of living a life running away from the monsters.
Thinking of the peaceful days in the past makes me feel like I'm dreaming.{nl}Being awake is like a very long nightmare.
I want to run away to another place if I can.{nl}Is there a future for the kingdom?
I can't sleep well nowadays.{nl}It's all because of those monsters.
To live at peace in a world where monsters are running wild... Impossible.
Does salvation even exist?{nl}Hanging on each day in hopes of the Goddess is really miserable.
We can't go out nor can we just stay. Is this really ok?{nl}I can't seem to find an answer no matter how much I think about it.
Getting used to a world living together with monsters, what a terrible and scary thing is that?
I heard that there are people who study monsters.{nl}What is wrong with them?{nl}Those monsters are bad creatures that could attack us at any moment.
I'm afraid that Klaipeda might become like the capital.{nl}It's now being called the fallen city, right?
Many people are afraid of Bokors for summoning the zombies.{nl}But we curse the enemy of the Goddess.
Intelligence, calm judgment and cold rationality.{nl}These are the qualities required for our Cryomancers.
Fire is grace sent to us by the Goddess Gabija.{nl}You cannot become a great Pyromancer if you overlook that.
It is vain death that lies at the end for those who only seek dauntlessness.{nl}If you wish to achieve true justice, lift the shield of Peltasta.
After the Goddesses disappeared, the capital was destroyed on the Day of Divine.{nl}I hope more people will become Paltastas to protect the world.
Rodelero Master
Master Squire
We are in chaos nowadays, but we used to live in honorable times before.{nl}Well.. they are all in the past now.
Master Wizard
No matter how much magic talent you have, it is useless unless you train hard.
You must be brave in order to protect the kingdom.{nl}But for that bravery to be different from recklessness, your skills should be good enough.
The Goddesses may be all gone but my powers are still doing fine, right?{nl}I'm sure it must be proof that Goddess Gabija is at least safe somewhere.
Master Quarrelshooter
It's painful to see people come to Klaipeda seeking refuge from the monsters.{nl}If they were Quarrel Shooters they wouldn't have to.
Ranger Master
I heard monsters swarm in flocks outside of Klaipeda.{nl}If I could improve my skill instead of attacking them one by one...
Sapper Master
People shouldn't do things they'll regret.{nl}Four years ago, on the Medis Diena, I lost even those of whom I wanted to ask for forgiveness.{nl}
Archer Master
Killing enemies one by one from a distance is the beauty of the bow and arrow.{nl}Doesn't matter how many shots you have to take, it's the actual shots that count, isn't it?
Priest Master
To suspect the Goddess does a Priest no good, for only faith can support him.
Sadhu Master
Truthful and divine entities  are inherent in all things.
Rexipher
You're late. {nl}So, you want to save the woman?
Technician Orion
Huge mouth inside Geltonas.{nl}Thunder is shaking. Huge mouth is biting on the head.{nl}
I think this phrase indicates very dangerous monsters.{nl}I think we should've just ripped up the note to begin with.
Please use this bait on the way to Geltonas Plateau.{nl}If you hide in the trees it shouldn't be long before a monster comes out.
Good job.{nl}Let's get moving before any stronger monsters find us.
If this note is true, we might die at any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?

There's something called a Dumble Ball.{nl}According to some soldiers, the Siaulambs changed dramatically after eating a Dumble Ball.{nl}It was as if they lost all fear... The solders said they'd never seen anything like it.{nl}

Fortunately, soldiers on patrol found where the Dumble Balls are.{nl}If we can find that place and burn it down, then we will have a chance.{nl}Please go look in the old wooden box at 4th supply warehouse.
Please don't ever think about eating it.{nl}I don't know what the ingredients are, but you will suffer from terrible diarrhea.
That's good. Please destroy it.{nl}The next location will be the 2nd supply warehouse.
You did such a dirty thing on our supplies.{nl}I can't endure my anger.
Soldiers are reporting that other monsters are appearing at Amzina Crooked Road.{nl}Please check if they are related to Sparnas.
Those silly things keep coming to us.{nl}Now may be the only chance we have to go and get Sparnas.{nl}Tell me when you are ready.
They are just creating so many problems.{nl}They even got their hands on the supplies, I will not feel enough even if I hit him with a bat in the middle of the market.
What? Tutu?{nl}I don't have time to think about those insignificant critters.
When you level up, you can increase a status of your choice and become stronger. {nl} Would you like to check it now?
It's important to think ahead about what you would want to be. {nl} It's never an easy thing.
Yes. That's how you do it. {nl} Pretty simple, huh?
Sir Aras is in the center area of the Woods. {nl} But there has been a tremendous increase in monsters around here so I suggest you don't go in.
Somehow Klaipeda has managed to hold back the monsters for now,{nl}but we have to find and remove the cause or we won't hold out for long.{nl}
That strange feeling I had in the Crystal Mine 3rd Gallery,{nl}it keeps occurring to me that it might be related to that girl the town people are talking about.{nl}
I just feel bad that I wasn't able to meet
Thank you for saving the villagers,{nl}but you're not going to the Closed Area, are you?
Let's unleash the last seal at the left side of here.{nl}The odor in the air is changing. I am sure it's a demon.
Demons are approaching. It's not good.{nl}It is sealed tightly, but I don't feel safe.
I caught the smell of a BiteRegina.{nl}I'm glad that you're safe.
Okay. The hidden door to the Divine Place is open now so please enter.{nl}You will see one of the two seals that protect the architects of Zachariel.
Now, we just have to see Zachariel's eternal sleep.{nl}It was a real honor for me to meet you.
Well done.{nl}Morcus is wating for you at the Long Bridge Canyon. Hurry.
There are people who are after Zachariel's inheritance.{nl}If they weren't sealed, those people must have taken them by now.
Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, that's strange. It seems that it never happened.
There were Gustas and my senior.{nl}Then am I the youngest? No..
Gustas is proud to protect the inheritance of Zachariel.{nl}I wonder what he's going to do after he hands over that job.
How many things are hiding in this canyon?{nl}More of king's inheritance will be here right?
According to the old records, the king erased the stonemason's memories using magic to protect the Mausoleum.{nl}I think it's amazing that he erased only those memories.
Liaison Official Nian
You saw it right? That's why I told you not to touch it.{nl}Because of this, we received an order to withdraw from this place.{nl}
Well, if I am to be involved in this, can you at least do me a favor?{nl}Tell Adel at Researchers' Camp to watch out for these kind of stones.
Historian Adel
Stone? I know of it.{nl}Do you want to to know what the stone is?
Monsters suddenly became violent and started attacking us.{nl}This is not an ordinary thing.
This will be enough.{nl}Vicious power..Demons are planning something.
Now I have a reliable colleague.{nl}You can get them from the nearby Hogmas. I'm counting on you.
Archeologist Friedka
I'm looking for a certain unique stone pole, but as a scholar getting it is beyond my skill.{nl}If you help me, you will be handsomely rewarded. Are you interested?
I know that we received an order to withdraw, but know this,{nl}the reward will be well worth your time. You won't regret it.
Okay. First collect amulets from Hogmas.{nl}After that, put those amulets on the stone pole at the bottom of Geltonas Plauteau.

We have to get out of here quickly before something bigger, and worse, finds us.{nl}Well, so far so good, but coming in so far is not without it's dangers.{nl}I hope the kingdom pays more attention to rescuing people than they do to these kinds of experiments.

Are you asking me how come a technician is at a place like this?{nl}As an advisior, of course. {nl} You'll need a technician like me to find out how this gigantic structure stood still for hundreds of years.
Looking at equations is one thing, but being out here...{nl}We will find the true nature of this place soon enough.
According to this map, the thing we are looking for is on the Stone Pole Hill.{nl}Okay then. Would you please make a rubber copy of it?{nl}{nl}
It would be best if I went there.{nl}Too bad my body isn't what it used to be though.
Well done.{nl}Since I got what I wanted, I should get out of here.{nl}There's a mark here that was ruined by magic. I wonder who did it.
I'll get out of here now.{nl}Let's go somewhere safe to continue our research.{nl}
By the way, why are these stones acting like this?
I'm sorry, I don't quite trust you yet.{nl}Come back when you have some more experience.
I just saw those villagers being taken away, and yet I could do nothing. I can't accept that.
Belief in yourself. Endless confidence. {nl} These are the most important things when projecting yourself in reality. {nl} That is the nature of Psychokino and the power that moves the world.
A Linker is someone who connects people with ropes of Mana.{nl}How strong the connection is depends on the quality of Mana.
Cataphract Master
Cataphracts have the power to go though the enemies that block their way{nl}They are brave warriors who fight on the front lines.
May I help you? {nl}Fortunately, we have some potions left in stock.
Looking for some good equipment? {nl} I have prepared the best ones available. {nl} Look around, the prices aren't bad either.
Oh, this anvil is my small gift to you for saving me. {nl} It's a useful item that can upgrade your equipment. {nl}
Well then, see you in the mines.
Miner's village Mayor
Goddess Saule
To retrieve the revelation, please go to Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Now is the chance when the Demons' Lord, Bramble recovers his power.
Mausoleum Foundation Stone
I pass my words to the revelator who comes here.{nl}I, Zachariel, sleep here to protect the goal of the goddess.
If something vicious comes here, protect here from it by waking the sleeping protector.{nl}{nl}
The manual to use Mausoleum Cube
The protector who is polluted with the vicious atmosphere will forget his responsibility to protect the Mausoleum.{nl}We can defeat the protector near the cube.
The manual of the protection system
The protecting device that forgot its mission to protect the Mausoleum is deserved to be destroyed.
The role of the protector
If we dedicate the power supply of the protector that forgot its mission, we can return it to the part of the Mausoleum.
The statue of the protector
The protectors are polluted with vicious energy.{nl}Destroy the polluted protectors to stop spreading.
The vicious beings are trying to take on from the roots of the tomb.{nl}If all controlling magics get polluted, we can't protect the tomb anymore.
The protectors are being polluted like a plague.{nl}We need to look for a special way.
We will destroy it when the polluted protectors are in sleep.{nl}Bring the condensed magic from the jar.
I am just praying to the goddess for the sleeping protectors.
We should destroy those protectors before they wake up to listen to demons' commands.
Destroy the protectors using the condensed magics.{nl}If someone disturbs, destroy him as well.
You should destroy them before they wake up.
It's very sad to listen to the commands of demons as the protectors of the tomb.
He is so tricky.{nl}I will face him at the deepest place in the tomb.
Mausoleum Blueprint
If an evil thing is close to a revelation of goddess, guardian is supposed to destroy the Mausoleum.
An evil thing is getting close to the revelation of goddess.{nl}But he wolud never get the revelation.{nl}
Revelator, go and get source of Mausoleum's power from the guardian.
It was prepared to against the existence who can not be taken by human.{nl}
Pour the source of Mausoleum's power into the Mausoleum pot.{nl}It will show a false revelation.{nl}
The evil thing will never get the revelation.
The existence has got a false revelation.{nl}How foolish obsession.{nl}
Put the guardian will into this pot and go to the last guardian.{nl}He will give you power to remove the evil thing.
Evil thing will never get the revelation of goddess.
To have guardians perform their mission, you need to correct the distorted control magic.

If the origins of Mausoleum's power be contaminated, guardians will lose their mission.{nl}You can purify the origins of Mausoleum's power by lighting up the stone lanterns with burning stone inside of a guardian.
Instruction of Mausoleum's power suppressor
Due to devil's tric, magical stream has been lost.{nl}You need to gather and charge magical sources of guardians.
It is good enough.{nl}Now, charge for lack of magical power.
I will open the way.{nl}Charge lack of magical power by reigniting the stone lantern of Mausoleum.
When suppressed power flows again, guardians will regain their reason.{nl}But it would take a long time.
Abnormal guardinans will attack the magical container.{nl}You should protect the magical container until suppressed power flows again.
Magical container is like the heart of Mausoleum.{nl}We would never let it be destroyed.
Lots of roles will find its place soon.{nl}But it will take a long time.
Evil energies have stagnated everywhere in the Mausoleum with the current of suppressed power.{nl}Find and remove the polluted lumps.
Mausoleum was designed perfectly.{nl}But devil's trick is beyond the perfect.
Our guardians are even under control, let alone do their mission.{nl}Everything is our fault.
Evil energies even have polluted the stone lanterns which are the origins of magical power.{nl}Destoy the polluted stone lanterns to stop spreading pollution.
Evil energies are pervading all over the Mausoleum.{nl}We can no longer remain pervasion.
It will no longer be polluted.
Mausoleum Document
Wheelen's mark give us power to face against those vicous beings.
Venucelos is very brave and loyal.{nl}But if his loyalty faces towards vicious beings, he will be worthless.
Zachariel was proud to make huge protectors.{nl}And he put secret letters inside them so that only the one who destroy the protectors could get them.
Vicious beings can't reach near the revelation of the goddess.
Coben
I am looking for my brother.{nl}If you could help me, I may give you some rewards.
He was really fanstastic.{nl}A person like me can not imagine.
Something is between the pages of diary.{nl}Blueprint.. Brother got something again.
I came here to look for my brother, but I am not brave like my brother.{nl}I want to you to take a look at the gravestone's writing on behalf of me.
Yes. My brother is a thief.{nl}My brother used to come to our shop once in a few years and told us his adventures.
So he challenged for the Great Magician's Tower?{nl}That's my brother! He can certainly do that.{nl}
The Magician's Tower was the fortress that the demons could not come near.
We should look for the next gravestone.{nl}If the writing can't be seen clearly, rub it with a Cockatries oil.
Magicians' Tower.. Do we have anything to steal there?
Yes! He will not end after stealing at the Magicians' Tower.{nl}I will go to Negybas Field first so follow me!
You came. The next gravestone is in front of me, but I am just a drunken coward.{nl}I will stay at the road on the left side of Negybas Field so you go and check it.
It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than looking back.
How could he think of using magic to the great magician?{nl}That's my brother.{nl}
We should check by rubbing Hallowventer's wooden coals.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negibas Fields.
He will do anything if he decides to do something.{nl}How could we have imagined that he will climb onto Magicians' Tower which even demons failed to climb?
Concentration of Demons' power?{nl}Ah! brother left me something.{nl}I brought it to give it back to him, but I don't know if it's right..
Brother told me that it is a device that will recharge demons' power when it is installed at the right place.{nl}But he also told us that it may summon a strong monster so he told us to be careful.
Magicians' Tower should let us enter it without any complaints.{nl}If I could find my brother with this.. It will be so good.{nl}
Yes. It is the gravestone..{nl}So now there is only one place left which I haven't been to. Follow me to Karsta Hall.
I am about to meet my brother.{nl}Please check the last gravestone.
His mind must had been like me here.{nl}Famous name can be a burden sometimes.
I am sure that my brother stood still even when he was confronting his death.{nl}But, even if we are in mud, living is more meaningful than dying..{nl}
I don't need this anymore.{nl}You have it. Please use it for more valuable purposes.
Then what should we do.{nl}
You should fight fire with fire.{nl}I will find the magician's weakness using magic and I will humiliate to her tower. Haha!
Stonemason Canolyn
Are you going to Fedimian as well?{nl}We are stonemasons. We are called to rebuild Fedimian so w should hurry..{nl}
There is no reason for those monsters walking around. {nl}They are just there.
Hey, Why are you so late?{nl}While you were gone, monsters stole everything from us!
We can reimburse for the expenses for others, but what about the tool box? {nl}We lost Sprit of Stonemason to Moa..
The ones with wings like sparkling things.
There was no tool box?{nl}Well. We can't do anything about it. I will think that I just got revenge on it.{nl}
Tara Milds
I am a doctor from Fedimian to help patients.{nl}I have some problems, can you help me?
There's a sign of plague within those monsters.{nl}Fortunately, I think it's not that serious.{nl}
Okay.{nl}Let's talk again at Negybas Field.
You came. Please get some dust sample from Hallowventer.{nl}There are many reasons for a plague to spread.
It is important to cure a disease, but it is more important to prevent it from the first place.{nl}You wash your hands all the time right?
Thank you.{nl}We just need one more sample.
This is an opportunity for us. Big Cockatries is suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails to use them for our research.
Even if we fail preventing the disease, we would be able to make a medicine quickly with our research results.
You got it. Thank you so much.{nl}You saved lots of lives in Fedimian.

The manual for the secret place
I hid the secret letters for the revelator who would come someday.{nl}Find the hidden energy of the protector and open the secret door.
The hiding place of the brother I used to serve is located at the abondoned farm up there.{nl}Please get the diary of the brother there.
Gritta

We have problems here, but I'm also worried about the other troops fighting in the Miners' Village. {nl} Normally, it should have been cleared up pretty fast.
Guard Gilbert
It's the Pantos again. {nl} They even stole the working parts. {nl} Well then, we've got to take them back, right?
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Well done. {nl} Now put this on and grease it then it will work as it should.
The Pantos hid some parts in the grasslands of Mieguista Hills. {nl} Try to get me those for the time being since it's urgent.
The Pantos think the grassland hides everything. {nl} I used to find that cute about them.
Guard Matthew
I am looking for cable car parts but nothings seems to be in sight. {nl} Maybe the Zignuts of Nepavy sun swallowed it. {nl}
I want to go destroy those demons, but..{nl}Cable car is not working well so I should go after fixing it.
If it wasn't for me, uncle Gilbert would have been going around looking through this huge area. {nl} I'm truly worried.
This is a sacred place we have enshrined for generations. {nl} We used to hold prayer and important meetings whenever there was a disaster {nl}
But it's been like this since it fell to evil forces four years ago. {nl} I guess the elders couldn't have helped it either.
In the past, it was just a rope on a lax basket. {nl} You had to put your life on the line whenever you crossed it. {nl}
So I went to Klaipeda and learned the skills myself. {nl} I have to start looking for a successor, but Matthew doesn't seem interested.
Guard Basil
The curse doll will be filled with the mine of Mushcaria. {nl} It is in the Tustanti Plateu, can you get it for me?
They used to be considered mysterious creatures, worthy of respect. {nl} But nowadays you just go a few steps outside town and they are everywhere, preying on people.
I forgot that Mushcaria is still alive. {nl} Anyway, good job.
There is enough time, so visit Algis first.
Now I will head this way to the church. {nl} Our Paladin friend likes the word 'if' a lot. {nl}
If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl} Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.
Guard Allen
The Mazas barrier which should the Demons have been destroyed. {nl} Would you help me repair it?
The barriers were made a long time ago. {nl} And now that I wasn't able to protect it well, what do I tell our ancestors?
I'm not smart enough to know anything about restoring the barrier so tell that to sir Kayetonas.
Follwer Kayetonas
No wonder. I was bewildered when the Demons suddenly appeared out of nowhere. {nl} I better let the Brothers know about this. Thank you.
Guard Kenneth
You can't let your guard down just because the Demon summoners are gone. {nl} We don't even know when this appeared in the first place. {nl}
Anyway, please tell Sir Kayetonas in Flower Hill about this.
It might be a bit extreme, but I'm thinking about getting rid of all the Demon souls.{nl}
You'd better get rid of the extracted souls quickly. {nl} Wouldn't it be scary to see them come back to life?
Actually, I had some doubts, but it seems to work? {nl} Please let Sir Kayetonas know about this. {nl} I think he will be pleased, he is in Flower Hill.
Now, I think I can live. {nl} We have to keep and stop the Demons. {nl} Please tell Sir Kayetonas that protecting this place isn't easy.
The demons are very strong.{nl}I will protect this place to block those demons.
Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
My old friend, Algis, will explain. Please listen to him.
I can see the monsters cleary from up here.{nl}He may get surrounded by them soon.
The broken barrier pieces are scattered in the Mazas shelter. {nl} Collect it and give it to sir Kayetonas in flower hill. {nl}
My poor father must be happy if he know I became a guard.{nl}But, I already made a mistake.
We can say it's peaceful for now.{nl}For now.
That's why if there are guards struggling with the barrier, I want you to help.
Heard the plan failed. {nl} I guess we have to do something before the Gesti recovers.
Guard Ella
Think about those flowers bite my leg someday.{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
I need the fluids of Nepenthes, but it doesn't wake up.{nl}If it doesn't wake up, there is no way to extract them.{nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
Follower Reeke
The eleders gave me many charms that will help me defeating the demons.{nl}I hope they help me.
Those elders don't have a sense of reality.{nl}We should have gone to the cathedral instead of those Paladins.
Good. Good.{nl}Let's see if it endures without standing up.
Let's wake up Nepenthes at Piene by burning these fats.{nl}The fluids will be no use if they get spoiled so we should extract them when its alive.
Only a person like me can handle that monster.{nl}What do you think?
They protected their regions, but I guess they came down because of those demons.{nl}

I will give you the stronger charm so use it after destroying Panto totem.{nl}Just like you did last time. You know it right?
Ah, and if brainwashed Panto attacks the attacking Panto, that Panto will be on our side as well.

Amazing.{nl}With this, the brothers at the cathedral can fight without any worries.

It's getting swallowed up side down.{nl}Very effective indeed.
Follower Vaidas
It is reassuring to hear that Brother Thomas will be in charge of the altar.{nl}
Brother Baidutis is waiting on the 1st Floor. {nl} Barrier of Gesti is blocking the way but it can simply be put off by the power of altar so not to worry.
Follower Buydas
I regret myself that I didn't bring enough Divine Stones.{nl}I should have put them in all my pockets.
The altars in the church are made to stop Demons. {nl} Of course, only we, the Paladins, know how to use them.
Is Brother Baidutis alright?{nl} I would have been in serious trouble if not for your help.
Follower Thomas
Yognome is trying to eat the altar.{nl}I want you to defeat Yognome.
If I have Divine Stones, I want to put them into Yognome's mouth.

I am making a lethal bomb to attack demons.{nl}If I have Purified Essence, it will be done. Can you help me?
Bombs in the cathedral doesn't sound good, but..{nl}I think the goddess will forgive me this time.
I want to test it on Glizardon.{nl}I will give you the bomb so can you put it onto the back of Glizardon?

Run away after setting the bomb on the back of Glizardon.{nl}Look at its size. It will not be fast.
I only have an empty divine stone.{nl}Can you help me to fill this stone?
We can sustain for a while if these stones can be filled without our brothers' help.
It is a strategy to attack the boss first when there are multiple enemies.{nl}This time, it will be Glizardon.
I never thought you would defeat it this quickly.{nl}Thank you for your help.
Follower Donatas
Thank you. {nl} This is sufficient to make a transformation scroll.
You can transform into a Demon by using this scroll. {nl} Persuade the Demons to go to the altar on their own.
I get caught every time, maybe the Demons know my scent. {nl} I'm sure it'll be easier for you since you haven't been around for long.
Alright. {nl} I think that would be enough for you to take a grasp of it.
The power of the altar makes conversion simple. {nl} First, you activate the power of Globejas altar. {nl} Then, stay within the influence of the altar and fight the Demons.
The Demons have stronger minds than you might think. {nl}It will take a lot of effort to make them forget Gesti.
Don't trust the waste too much since Glizardon may find out about it.
I am thinking about an effective way to defeat the demons.{nl}I feel so reliable since you came.
When we install the divine stones, the monsters near them will suck their lives themselves.{nl}Ignore the monsters that lost their lives.
You can obtain Vicious Essence from the demons.{nl}You can purify it from the altar down.
Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the Demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.

There isn't only one monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.
Who cherished such traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?

His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.
If we received support than we would have hired mecenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor so i don't understand why the support has stopped.
Thanks.{nl}Echart must have drawn to the power of the magic that is casted upon the monument.
You look live a wood so it's curious to find out that you are interested in stone plates.
I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it's not already eaten.
Don't you think we would be able to find the fragments that Treeambulo swallowed if we burn it?{nl}I have the woods that I stacked before so we push it into it while the woods are burning.
Be careful.{nl}It will be dangerous if Treeambulo in flame runs into the camp.

I am a treasure hunter and not a monster hunter.{nl}I don't want to add my gravestone here by touching it.
ve Collected all the debris out of the deal is over Raymond. {nl} brought back the parcel to Raymond.
Ethan told you to give it to me?{nl}Hmm. It will take sometime to restore it.{nl}
Can you take the restored gravestone fragments to my assistant at Irody Square?{nl}I think something good will happen when we finish restoring it.
Epigraphist Smid
This.. Our master did it!{nl}Give it to me.
Not yet. Little more.{nl}I think I just need to do little bit more.

Please put those sacrifices in the jar at Dumbal Pond.{nl}The summoned sprit will come to me if you succeed.
It depends on how one uses necromancy.{nl}It could be good or bad depending on what Necromancer has in his mind.
The experiment failed? I am so sorry.{nl}I should research more here to find out what went wrong.
Monument of Lydia Schaffen
My name is Lydia Schaffen.{nl}To endure deep and strong sadness from now, I am going to tell my truth about Ruklys on this land.
There are no more wood coals besides the ones you have so don't use them too much.
I didn't know she was the alumnus to the traitor, Ruklys.{nl}Damn. I almost used all the wood coals.
Eventually, Ruklys failed.{nl}He was destroyed by the ones who were jealous of him.{nl}He left to the goddess from my hands.
What was Lydia Schaffen's relationship with Ruklys?{nl}I am not smart enough to understand.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
The stage that Ruklys had reached was astonishing.{nl}But, his noble mission was too difficult to be accomplished on this land.
Since I am on a long journey, my luggage is not heavy.{nl}It's better to buy anything from local shops.
Any archers would want to have good arrowheads.{nl}I will show you good arrowheads so how about you help me a bit?
They are not quick enough so they won't be hard.{nl}For sure.
Thanks. Very hot.{nl}Isn't it so nice?
Wandering Spirit

I understand. Please take this Unicorn's horn to that girl.{nl}Her brother went missing after that.
Girl
I told him not to go..
So it was terrible. {nl} I was lucky I almost get dispatches.
If you have trouble pulling it over to the burning firewoods, then kick just kick it hard.
I need the flame of Infroburk at Shiluma altar.{nl}Getting close to the back of that monster and heats the arrows.

You will know what's on Rukly's monument after restoring it.
Great. {nl} Leave activating the altar to me and go to Vidas in Himnas chapel.
Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
Good. This will be enough.

I've never seen a stone with full of divine energy as this.{nl}Thanks for trying your best.
