Follower Baidutis
I came to say that the Gesti went up to the 2nd floor and let my guard down. {nl} I would have been in a big trouble if not for you.
I studied the barrier of the gate but power of the basement altar will not be enough. {nl} Unless you add the power of crytal held by Corylus.
Maybe the Goddess knew it'd fail and that's why she said wait for the Revelator. {nl} At least, we got the Gesti hurt so it can also be good.
Well done. {nl} Making the crystal of light with this will enough power to break the barrier.
Prepare yourself before bringing the crystal of light to the gate. {nl}It can attract powerful monsters.
I think I'll stay here to stop the Demons from entering the basement.
It is an honor to fight with you, Revelator. {nl} Could you drive the Demons from this area while Sir Algis investigates?
If you are okay, can you take Eyes of Madness to Rodelin?{nl}They are handy when you want to hide yourself from demons.
I don't want those filthy things to be near me either.{nl}But, it's worse to face against those demons alone.
Thanks.{nl}I should share them with other brothers before the demons find out.
You are indeed the revelator.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on protecting the altar.
The barrier of main entrance in 1st floor can be offset by the power of the church so don't worry. {nl}That's what the altars are for. {nl}
Let's take care of the Unknocker first. {nl} I'll lead the Unknocker so you try to find a chance.
I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.
Be careful since I got almost attacked as well.{nl}They are really violent.
Good job. {nl}The babbling laughter seems to have stopped.
It's a bit blasphemous, but we don't have much choice.
Well done. {nl} It will probably be difficult to trust each other from now on. {nl}
I'm thinking of converting the Demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted Demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
But before that, it's important to understand the Demons. {nl} Collect the souls of the Demons
I remember the first time I converted the Demons. {nl} I pray for their poor souls.
Great job. {nl} If there are any good Demons, the Goddess will look after them.
The Central Altar suppressing the power of the Demons suddenly stopped. {nl} Could you take a look at what's going on?
Strange, it was definitely working.
It was an ambush. {nl} We would have been in big trouble without your help.
You need the seal of space to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl} It's hidden in Sventove Central Altar but i hope it's not too late.
Structures in the Tenet Cathedral are placed to ward against the Demons. {nl} Each one in itself is a small barrier that contributes to a huge barrier. {nl}
The most powerful barrier is in the 2nd floor. {nl} I heard that it can exert the greatest force when the divine sphere is there.
Gesti made the first move. {nl} It will be difficult to approach secretly.
I must change the plan. {nl} First you need to go watch the movement of the Gesti. {nl}
Let's start by occupying the bell tower.
From here, we can see what Gesti is going to do.
Alright, bring the seal of space from Sventove Central Altar. {nl} You can do it, right?
You must know that the revelation is hidden in the sanctuary. {nl} The seal of the space is the only key that get you to the sanctuary. {nl}
It's not just the Tenet Cathedral. {nl} You can enter all the places that the Goddess hid.
The seal of space can only be used by the Revelator so you won't be able to find the revelation right away. {nl}
But the enemy is the Demon King. Even the Paladin Master couldn't defeat him.{nl}I should use the power of Broken Altar.
We can't do anything about the destroyed altar but the fragments still have power. {nl} Gather the pieces and insert it in the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
When you are done, I will be able to tie up Gesti through the power of the divine crystal and the church. {nl} It may be for a short while but that's the best option we have.
So you activated the Malda altar? {nl} Now it will be safe to stay here for the time being. Good work.
Demon are going around the second floor searching every corner. {nl} Activating the Auka altar will be able to turn their attention.
I'm relieved you're beside me. {nl} I think it was a good thing that Laima chose you.
Good job. {nl} When this is over, I should gather all brothers and drive them away at once.
I'll ring the bell and let you know when the Gesti show up so have a safe trip on your way.
So you found the seal of space. {nl}Use the seal on the pillar beside me to go to the sanctuary. {nl} It is prepared for the Revelator only.
May the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
So Gesti just ran away. {nl} Fine. Since you got the revelation, we've completed the mission. {nl}
When you find the revelation, tell Mater Paladin of the story you've been through so far. {nl} May the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
Seems like Gesti did not notice yet. {nl}Better prepare the divine crystal.
All the preparations made. {nl} Barriers of the church will soon weaken the Gesti. {nl}
The weakened Gesti will be enough for you to handle. {nl} When the Gesti is cornered, I will make the final strike with the divine sphere.
This is a piece of Mazas shelter barrier. {nl} Do not worry. {nl} There are ways to recover the barrier so I'm sure it will be alright.
I didn't know the Demons will use the summoner to come across here. {nl} Better get rid of them all before they seige us.
Even with so many Demons, you still managed to make it through. {nl} You may be the Revelator, but that's still impressive. {nl}
It's the revelation. {nl} Cherish it and do not show it to anyone else. {nl}
Come on. Go to the Paladin Master. {nl} He will tell you the way you must go.
I asked my precious friend Algis for Tenet Church. {nl} I won't lose to Gesti but it is important to have some back up plan just in case.
In the kingdom, there are several valuable weapons aside from this divine sphere. {nl} Those weapons saved many lives on the Medis Diena four years ago.
From now on, I will focus on the divine crystal. {nl} In the meanwhile, please use your skills so that I won't be disturbed.
I'm sorry. It's all my fault. {nl}The Gesti found out the divine heal is not the revelation so it will head straight to the church. {nl}
But his old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl} Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
It is too much for me to handle alone without any help from other brothers. {nl} I'd better run the Malda Altar. {nl}
We still have a lot to do here.{nl}The goddess told us to never give up.
The world still needs more experience. {nl} We probably wouldn't have made it this far without the help of the Goddess.
The activation of tree guard post is taking longer than I thought. {nl} We have no time, let's use a Demon's soul instead.
All souls are pure. {nl} So even if it's a Demon's soul, it can still provide some divine power.
Oh the Tree guard post was filled with soul of the Demon. {nl} It still needs some final touches to complete but I'll take care of it. {nl}Great job.
It's amazing you can use the barrier like that. {nl} Even the Paladins did not know about that. {nl}
Standing against this much enemies itself is a great deal. {nl} It's all thanks to the Paladin Master.
Even though he's still young, Kenneth is amazing. {nl}I think we can entrust him a little more.
This is the message from the guards.{nl}A gigantic demon monster is coming this way.{nl}Follow me quickly.{nl}
Biteregina that used to live in the deep forest came here.{nl}It even built the hive at the upper side of Rojus Plateau. Can you get rid of it since it's dangerous?
Thank you so much!{nl}How could they come from such a far forest?{nl}Strange, isn't it?
I can't do anything since Sidmias are attacking us.{nl}Can you defeat them?
Those Sidmias want me to put my head on that flower bud.{nl}It's not good at all.
We received the charm from the elders that will brainwash Pantos to stand on our side.{nl}Do you want to take up the challenge?{nl}
According to the elders, we are done with those Pantos.{nl}We can't continue the relationship anymore.
This barrier is impossible to open from the inside. {nl} Fortunately, the entrance to the basement looks safe. {nl}
However, it's too dangerous to in the basement with the divine sphere. {nl} I'll wait here so you go to the 1st floor through the basement and open the barrier. {nl}
You have done what other can't easily do.{nl}The goddess must be proud of you.
My faith in religion is strong enough to destroy those demons, but the reality isn't that simple.{nl}I hope you help us a bit.
Get rid of the Demons around the tree guard barrier. {nl} The souls of the Demons will be able to fill the divine powers a little. Thanks!
Very good. Those flowers on the ground will be enough.{nl}Don't you think so?
We are the people following the Paladin Master.{nl}We will defeat the people who disobey the goddess.{nl}
Everyone has their reasons for following him.{nl}Some of them received benefits from him and some of them were already Paladins like Algis.
Maybe the goddess knew it would happen and that's why she waited for the savior.{nl}I feel like I put a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}
This is the plan that was carried on for hundreds of years since the first Paladin.{nl}We should never fail this plan.
Please put the pieces to the Ruklys memorial in front of preparing me rubbings. {nl} because had been working with us and listening together, you'll be able to simplify. {nl}
I will follow you soon. Just a moment.
After we finish the rubber copying, we can say farewell to this place.{nl}Can you help me a bit more?
The capital may already be in ruins, but I will protect Klaipeda.
Using all your power to crush any enemy that would threaten the Kingdom. {nl} That's how Highlanders fight in battle. {nl}
Good work, guys. {nl} Actually, I was also an adventure but the results seem to be fine. {nl} You just need to tell it like that to sir Kayetos in Flower hill.
Seems like even Auka altar lost its powers. {nl} There were stories about its powers wiping out dozens of Demons in the past.
It's hard to watch the Egnomes running around the Atgaila chapel.{nl} Please clean up the Egnomes.
Many Treasures of the Paladin which should not go into the hands of the Demons are also here. {nl} You should not fall into it.
After using this amulet on those Pantos, hit them several times.{nl}Try those Pantos at Levanda military camp.
Isn't this city amazing? I want to stay here if I can.{nl}But, I prefer going to other places with my horse.
The space movement magic field will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
I hope the monsters don't break the field yet.
Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters won't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for Demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
I hope that crazy magician, Antares, won't disturb us.
He set a trap so well.{nl}I didn't like him even he was concious.
We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.
Damn, why now..{nl}

The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

Antares has done research on the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere..
The research materials should be here somewhere..
This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
Let's go find the last valve at the central control room.{nl}When we destroy this, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the barrier device.
A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magics in case something happens.{nl}There was a magic written in Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have gone wrong when Antares exploded a while ago.
Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. It seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
And me.. I feel dizzy..
If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
By the way, how do I know about the stabilizing device?{nl}I've never been to the 4th floor..
Okay.. My memories keep coming back..{nl}
Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
It's almost done. Yes..
You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to fully stabilize it so let's go to the lab room.
I hope the device is okay..
Good! We can activate the device now.
You are the revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Magicians' Tower.
Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive any help.
This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all my power somehow.{nl}
I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go in.
Gabija did not hide herself.{nl}She just coudnl't come forward because she had to protect the tower from demons.{nl}
I heard Agailla Flurry went because she coun't find a successor. {nl}I heard it was for something important.. But I don't know what it is.
The Medis Diena can strike anytime again whether it is in your hometown or my kingdom. {nl} The culprit of the plague would be something worthy of my sword.
Owyn
Support? It really cheers us up!{nl}Please get rid of the monsters nearby.
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}Only Gabija is protecting the tower herself.
Those demons attacked before, but this battle is taking so long time.{nl}Maybe, Helgasercle which I read from a book has appeared again..
As a follower of the great Flurry, I can't back away yet!
You are indeed the revelator.{nl}Look at you!
With this momentum, please do it one more time.{nl}I am gonna destroy the other monsters, so please get rid of Drake.
Those monsters are not that strong when we fight together!
Now I feel safe.{nl}I am gonna be okay by myself from here. Thanks!{nl}{nl}
Cordelier
Black coal powder..With that, we can unleash the seal that is written on the manual, but I can't just find it.{nl}I am sorry, but could you bring me the powder?
Isn't it better to just scratch the powder from the monsters nearby?
Thanks!{nl}Now, I better get ready to unleash the seal.
Damn. I forgot the eternal light.{nl}I should have requested you before..please get that.{nl}
I should have requested you all at once.{nl}I make mistakes all the time.
Is he Ginklas? I hope it's just the bookshelf falling down in the reading room.{nl}Can you check the bookshelf?
I haven't seen a monster who can make this much vibration before.
You are indeed Ginklas. You are so amazing!{nl}Because of you, I earned enough time to prepare for magics.
Sealed Stone
I am much more than you could imagine.{nl}I want to be released from restraints. Please get rid of those observers nearby.
Get rid of the observers.{nl}There's the Eye of Surveillance at Blindlem and Belegg.
I will be released soon.
I can't tell my name. {nl}Please get rid of the observers and unleash the seal on me.{nl}
Amazing. You possess a great power.
Another me from somewhere else led you to this place. {nl}Now, I can be released.
But, if I get released like this, I will be seperated into pieces.{nl}
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Arc.
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken into pieces and the observers obtained those pieces.
Now, I can be released.
As long as there is the Eye of Surveillance, I can't be released from restraints.{nl}Please get rid of the observers and release me.
I am tied to a contract.{nl}I am free, but not really free.
I was sealed when my sprit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please get rid of Infroroktor for me. I promise I will not be a burden to you.
Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
It's way better without the observers.
Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Fallenlem.
His creatings should have voices to listen{nl}
The pieces from another me are able to call you now.{nl}Now, I can be released.
I am tied to restraints. The old microbes are threatening me.{nl}Teach them what the manner is.
You should give them a lesson so that they behave properly.
You have defeated them well. {nl}Now, I can rely on you to unleash this seal.
Please unleash this seal on me.{nl}When you gather the essences of restraints from the observers, this seal will break.
You will know when the time comes.
Skeptical Desk
There's a Golem near here.{nl}I am too scared to go out. Please help me.
This won't come out.
Thanks.{nl}I will stay here until it gets safe and then run away.
Furry Odd
Nice to see you. {nl}I am Furry Odd. I am a magician specialized in variating things.{nl}
The revelator at this moment. The goddess has helped us.{nl}Can you help us collecting variation mediums from monsters?
The magicians that ran away?{nl}What can we do.. For them, their lives are more important than the goddess Gabija.{nl}I don't think they are cowards. They are just pathetic.
Thanks. You are so reliable.
We have enough mediums now so we will go defeat the remaining monsters.{nl}Do you wanna come along?
You are so great.{nl}I hope our magicians can be as good as you.
There's a problem.{nl}I think I saw Jonna Jolem inside the technical room.. But's it's too much for me.{nl}
I will take care of other monsters so you take care of Jonna Jolem.
I am not strong enough to face Jonna Jolem.{nl}It's fortunate that you are here.
Thank you so much for helping me. It's so good that you are here.{nl}May the Goddess bless you!
I can't stand it anymore. Please save me from the restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the observers nearby.
The time to retrieve the body and the soul is near.
I can't endure anymore.{nl}Please destroy the observers that restrain me.{nl}
So I guess I can be released now.
I promise. We can wait for other days.
Simon Show
We should block Bearkaras, but there are so many monsters.{nl}Can you help us?
Now it's time to get revenge!
You are so great. {nl}Now we can face it.
I will go to the small hall to chase after Bearkaras so please reduce the number of monsters.{nl}I am counting on you!
I have no way to defeat Bearkaras myself..{nl}I am sorry to have shown you this..
Bearkaras is still near here.{nl}You are our last hope. We are counting on you.
It was a good decision to trust you.{nl}I am more motivated because of you.
The contract needs to continues. Please release me.{nl}As those observers fall down, my spirit becomes free.
It wasn't a long time, but it was frightening for me.
Now only the last piece is left.{nl}
The last spirit is in the observer Stone Whale.{nl}My sprit will be free when he gets defeated.
My body was ripped off, humiliated.. I can't forgive that..
Quickly.. We should continue the contract.{nl}
I will leave now to find my remaining pieces.{nl}We will meet someday in the future.
It's so good to hear that you will participate.{nl}I want you to get back Flame charm which I set inside Black Drake.
Don't ever think of blocking axe from in front.{nl}You will be crushed into powders.
You should go to the great cathedral to follow the revelation,{nl}But, unfortunately, you are not skillful enough.
Train more at the entrace of Katin Forest. {nl}Believe that you will get your victory at the end.
Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
Look at this busted cable car.{nl} The damage is pretty serious. {nl}
It's obviously the work of Grummer and Zignuts from the Cholras road. {nl}Give them a taste of your skills while I fix this.
This would not have happened if the old people had lent their ears on what the young men said. {nl} But what's done is already done. What can we do about it?
Good work. {nl} It's the parts the Pantos stole before. {nl} I never imagine I'd be seeing it again like this.
Guard Molly
The Pantos were not always such violent monsters. {nl}There must be a way to change them back. {nl}
I want you to give young Pantos the highland beets in Nyosalrus Street.{nl}Then they would come to remind me of something?
It's a bitter thing indeed. {nl} No matter how troubled the world is, they weren't like that before.
That's right. Thank you very much! {nl} Have you seen a broken cable car there? I used to ride that when I was a kid.
Thank you! {nl} You've saved me and my friends from spending more than half of our lives just protecting the cable car. {nl}
Since I'm the only one who can fix the cable car, I'll consider it clear. {nl} Oh, of course, thanks for your help.
Please bring me the Mally seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the shaman doll. {nl} {nl}
So exciting. {nl} Some straws, seeds, and a bit of rope and those kinds of things can go around alive.
Guard Mory
The Simorph popping out is a bit frightening. {nl} So the Pantos can fall this bad.
Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl} The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
Contamination is everywhere, but I think Labure Road is the worst. {nl} Maybe it's spreading through the roots?
Look at these gentle pantos. {nl} It's insane that we have to make the pantos our enemies when the evils are charging in.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
If you persuade the Capria, the Pantos will be tamed. {nl}Capri is the leader of pantos. {nl}
Let's follow the baby pantos. {nl}It will definitely lead the way to Capri.
I hope the Capria would understand us. {nl} We should do whatever we can.
Got angry right away when seeing the baby Pantos? {nl} Would it really not work.
I worked so hard to fix it but I'm worried for the Poatas. {nl} Monsters of that size can destroy the cable car.
Our guards love to fight {nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the Demons waiting to march in.
The Poatas also destroyed the cable car in Nepavy. {nl}But it's not like we can guard it all the time. {nl}
Even if we stay on guards, a fight with the Poatas? {nl} That's not easy.
This place has a very sacred meaning for us. {nl} And we have called ourselves the watchmen for protecting this place. {nl}
It has been protected since the day the promised by the first Paladin. {nl} And now that the Demons have invaded, it is time to keep that promise.
Pantos changed and became wild after the Medis Diena four years ago. {nl} Before that, we didn't really mind each other and even joked around together. {nl}
I really wonder what has become of the sacred land?
The Caprias were the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl} And then the Pantos.. now only the babies are left.
Our family has been protecting this land for a long time.{nl}Please cooperate with us to keep the reverent atmosphere here.{nl}- Guard
Thank you for helping out. {nl} My workload has reduced a lot.
We used to be on good terms with the Pantos. {nl} These days, we're constantly at each other's throats.
I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}The dolls for spells. Isn't it exciting?
Thank you. {nl} We might be able to go get more when more young men come.
I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil forces. {nl} I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
We can't do anything until Basil restores the shaman doll perfectly. {nl} Unless for special situations like this, we can use, uhm, nothing.
It would have been a disaster if the Carnivore had had legs. {nl} I'm glad it was killed beforehand.
I heard we promised the first Paladin three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
To help build the Tenet Cathedral, {nl} to protect the divine relics by having watchmen guard the sacred land, {nl} and lastly, to protect each other together when great danger arises. {nl}
I do not know what curse it was. {nl} There's got to be a record in the Tenet Cathedral.
Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
It does not curse like the Bokor's. {nl} It moves by itself to attack, or something like that.
The Demons could have used their hands to make it easier for them to attack. {nl} Or maybe they were eyeing on the divine heal. {nl}
Since the divine heal was hidden deep below the ground. {nl} Who could have known that the reason for the world's overturn was because of the plants?
You may use a bit of force if words aren't enough. {nl}We can't grow any further from each other anymore.
You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
If possible, get rid of the Carnivore too. {nl} It was contaminated by the Magi and I can't stand watching it anymore.
Make a mess in the nest of Poatas in Margas Hill and it will appear. {nl}
Liaison Official Colin
Rexipher? {nl} Although it is the first time I've heard the name. {nl}
The Desk of Mausoleum
You can't obtain the secret and precious wisdom of the Mausoleum even if you wish.{nl}When the time comes and you are ready, you will be able to fetch it.{nl}
Bring me the blood stone.{nl}It's not late yet. You can still make it in time.
Make sure that you come back within the time frame.
Don't forget your mind about the opportunity and the preparation. [?]
Since you told me about my brother's death, I want to give you some rewards if you want.{nl}I've collected it to leave again with my brother, but I don't need it anymore.
Isn't it Drake's horn?{nl}Are you going to sell all of them?{nl}
No. It's too precious to be used that way. {nl}With this much amount, we could even make Drake's Epaulet.{nl}I will give you the manual. Are you interested in making it?
With this key, we can open the treasure chest.{nl}But, you will need to look for the chest yourself.
Crafting is only possible during rest mode. {nl}You know it already right?
If it weren't for you, I would just live believing that my brother is living well somewhere. {nl}You can't say you are not responsible for this.
Well made.{nl}You will definitely need it sometime in the future.
Until then, I would hold on to it.{nl}When you need it, don't forget to come and take it from me. I will give it to you when the time comes.
You surely know a lot of people. {nl}All the masters at Klaipeda and Fedimian know your name.{nl}
Do you want to bet on this? {nl}Answering all the questions at Magicians' Tower.
You can get the quizzes from the magicians from the 1st to 4th floors of the Magicians' Tower.{nl}I will give you a small present if you can solve all of them.
Wow, you came up here! You are incredible.{nl}Okay that's it for questions, shoud we do other things?
Nothing special. {nl}If you can collect all scattered pages of the book at the laboratory room on 3rd floor, I will take that as you answered the question.
That book is very important to me so I can't just leave this place.
Yes. That's correct! This is it.{nl}
The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself.. Such a pity.
I heard your story before.{nl}You did a tremendous job at the Magicians' Tower right?{nl}
That's why I have a favor to ask you.{nl}
This is the pumpkin where lizard is in. {nl}I heard it's somewhere..I am sure you will find it.
Thank you. This is an amazing jewel.{nl}It is rare that a Sadhu is interested in contemporary objects.
That proves that it is an important object.
Unknown being.
How dare someone wants to confront me.{nl}Tell me the secret number. I can't tell you unless you tell me the number.
You're a brave guy. {nl} There are five clues in 1st Mine Lot . {nl} No need to hurry. It will take a long time.
Found it. {nl} Then I'll start from now.
I'll give you a riddle. {nl} It is something you must do, have done most, and will have to do. {nl} Show your answer in action.
Good work. {nl} You will be rewarded with proper compensation.
What do you think are the factors that affect outcomes?{nl}If you just focus on attacking, then you may receive more damages.
If you ask me what is the strongest weapon, I will answer that is is faith.{nl}A colleague that you can truly rely on.
Thaumaturge does not get stronger by learning.{nl}You should learn it yourself.
Stealth, detection, trap installation. {nl} Scouts are masters of searching and monitoring.
We Sadhu are always on an eternal journey. {nl}When our journeys in this world come to an end, we'll still continue in the afterlife.
Nothing is unfair in real battles.{nl}You've gotta do anything to win. Don't you think so?
We should find it quickly..{nl}It may be an end to Macians' Tower.
I don't mind people learning my skills if I receive reasonable rewards.{nl}In truth, I will welcome them.{nl}Although, I won't chase after them to learn them from me.
But, well. {nl}Asking me to teach in the military is just too much ..{nl}Could it be another problem?
Welcome! What do you need?{nl}The stuffs I have are not like old days, but I tried my best to prepare them.
Old Man
You must have seen lots of artifacts while coming to this city.{nl}But in front of a long history, those heroes were just small beings.
Especially, Ruklys from Maven's disciples.. I feel so sorry.
There's an interesting stroy behind that gigantic statue.{nl}Should you have a chance
Silver of Fedimian
Read a book called
The spear in itself is a weapon of pure  destruction.{nl} It is the best weapon anyone can easily learn and master.
Golem, that's awesome. {nl} And you remember what I taught you?
I guess the Revelator really is different. {nl} You you seem to be different from the other Revelators too...
You looked so cool when you defeated the Golem. {nl} Where did you learn to do that?
I'm grateful for your help. {nl} Commander Uska is waiting for you in Klaipeda, so go find him.
I firmly believe that the Goddess will return someday. No doubt about it. {nl} We have to believe it. If we do not believe in the Goddess then who will?
Please hurry and support the Miners' Village. {nl} Someone like you will be of great help.
I heard the stories. So you defeated the Vubbe Fighter, huh? {nl} That's incredible.
I was anxious watching from a distance but it was really awesome.
Frankly, I'm scared. {nl}Miners' Village, and then the East Woods... Even Klaipeda is becoming dangerous.
Although I am very concerned about Miners' Village, {nl}at least it has calmed down this much thanks to you.
Healer Lady
We pray that the blessings of the Goddess will always be with the Revelator who saved us.
I'm helping the refugees. {nl} The monsters attacked the village.
Miner's manager Bringker
Still anxious. {nl} But thanks to you things are better than before.
I can't believe the Cunningham's story is true... I think it needs more research.
Everything has a source called Mana. {nl} And everyone can connect to each other's Mana if they want. {nl} Just like digging a canal.
Have you ever seen Vubbes using pickaxes? {nl} What are they trying to find...
Thank you very much for saved us.{nl}
If you still want to enter the Closed Area, collect the strange stone from the Vubbes. {nl} Stic it to the wall and the crystal wals open.
What are you doing here? {nl} Go into the mines quickly. {nl} Weren't we supposed to meet in 1st Gallery?
No demons would be able to cross here.{nl}I will do my best to protect here so they can't interrupt the Paladin Master.
Firm faith in us is the greatest shield.{nl}We always fought with our justice and faith.
Well done.{nl}As the Paladin Master, I salute to your accomplishment.
Guard Hames
We should do anything to protect here from those demons.{nl}This land is divine.
I would have fled long time ago if it wasn't for that pledge.{nl}I am still the son of the great guard.
We should somehow block those demons.{nl}I can't pass this danger to our brothers in the cathedral.
We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}To open the door, we should go through 1st floor of the basement.
When I meet you again, is this world going to be peaceful.. I hope it is.
I never expected those demons will come down this far.{nl}I hope our brothers stand still against them.
We have lots of things to protect so we should rather defeat those demons quietly than excitng them.{nl}I feel much more safe with you.
Honestly, I thought it would be hard to stand still with only Paladins.{nl}I guess my belief in them wasn't that much.
It will be better to fight them face to face instead of hiding.{nl}It will be even better if the opponents are the demons.
So humans can also defeat the demon king.{nl}I can't believe it.
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
You fought hard.{nl}May the goddess bless you in the future.
Let's pay more attention to the safety of our people here.{nl}Where is the maid of Jonas?
When I focus on the research, I sometimes don't know even when the monsters come.{nl}To think back about that moment, it is still frightening.
Take a look around you from the next time.{nl}I almost got involved in it.
I thought I remember almost everything.{nl}I guess I have alzheimer. I can't remember the face of the guy who I used to work with.
There's a guy who I used to work with.{nl}I just can't remember his face.
We don't have time to waste here.
Thanks for helping me last time.{nl}All I have are the research materials. I don't know why the monsters are after them.
I've done a wrongful thing to Niels.{nl}I remember everything now. I feel embarassed.
Security Guard
The artifacts you discover here can't go out from here.{nl}Even if you are the revelator.
This is the place where lots of scholars are doing their researches so please do not make loud sounds.
When suppliers are lacking, merchants like me are more needed.{nl}That's the way of this world.
Why are monsters taking these.{nl}At least, it is fortunate that we still have this much materials.
This is the first time I've been at a dangerous place like this.{nl}This place is so deserted so I have no idea why monsters are here.
Gorath
There are many people went missing. Where is this guy?
Badat
I lost the research materials again.{nl}How many time have you lost them so far?
Stonemason Pipoti
I shouldn't have done that.{nl}This is all because of me.
I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.
Kevin
This is a strange place.{nl}Those scholors, and those mercenaries just can't leave this place.{nl}Of course, us too.
Sculptor Hilda
Look at these poles.{nl}Aren't they beautiful?
The beauty of these poles make us forget the monsters' scariness.{nl}They are really amazing.
They are not only beautiful, but they also have writings on them.{nl}Maybe we should read them sometimes.
The reason why this isolated canyon is beautiful is because it keeps a secret somewhere.
Our family's first mission has been just achieved.{nl}Now is the start.
Supply Commander Vio
Today is quiet.{nl}I am talking about those monsters.
We are veterans.{nl}After all those years at mercenary, we should not be confused even if we haven't heard anything in years.
Mercenary Eta
I will come back soon so don't worry.{nl}This was an easy thing when I was young.
How would the commander scold us this time..
Archeologist Laudi
The goddess and the demons.. Zachariel's Mausoleum and the secret of the artifacts...
Morcus Jonas
The guy that the old man used to talk alot, is he coming..
The oldman told us.{nl}When you go against your destiny, that also is a part of your destiny.{nl}Maybe the reason why we are trying hard is because that's our destiny.
How come no one remembers it.{nl}The man with silver hair.. he..
An unknown event that is being plotted by an unknown person..{nl}This is really scary..
Now is the time to concentrate on the research, but I can't concentrate at all.{nl}Also where is my assistant..
Without Irene, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.
Irene saved my life.{nl}And you also saved my life.
I heard the story but I can't really believe it. {nl} Getting rid of the Vubbe Fighter.
Where is the scholar. I am really worried.
Without Dezik, I would have probably gone crazy within those monsters.{nl}Of course, thank you so much for your help as well.
We are about to leave here, what's the matter?{nl}I haven't heard that we would receive reinforcements.
We should leave here soon.{nl}No one knows which stone will bring which monsters.{nl}Why is this happening..
Do you think it makes sense that we should leave because the archeologists are not valuable anymore?{nl}There are artifacts everywhere on this land!!
I think my guess won't be wrong. Something is happening.{nl}I can't give up.
The thing I want should be here, but I just can't find a way to find it.{nl}Hmm. What shoud I do.
My heart is breaking to leave a great place like this.{nl}But, we don't have a choice.
Do you think I am crazy to stay here longer?{nl}I am gonna leave here as quickly as possible. See you next time!
Historian Cyrenia Odell
This feeling..{nl}Is it the feeling of an historian, or the fear that comes from human instinct..
Adventurer Vakis
Explorer? Of course it is not dangerous. {nl} However, Guchi~ari~tsu when you discover something is guided in a row this day.
Historian Rexipher
There's an old saying.{nl}A person who fights against beasts should be careful not to be a beast himself.{nl}When you look at the abyss for a long time, the abyss will also look at you..{nl}
I have a feeling that I would meet you again.{nl}Farewell until then..
I came here because historians invited me to this place.{nl}They wanted my advice as a stonemason.
I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.
Liaison Officer Bail
We are not responsible for the safety of a person who is not registered.{nl}Please go back to a safe place.
I am sorry, but you are not in the list.
Historian Colin
Well, I don't know anything.{nl}Hmm..not at all.
How can I put all these materials in order?
A person who uses a demon's name.. He must be crazy.

Okay.{nl}Please find the Grave Protector Owl from the grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}If he could lend us his power, it will be a good chance to defeat Sequioa.
Believer Adele
Thorny vines are also plants so they must be weak to strong mountain.{nl}What do you think? Isn't it a good idea?
Filibo?{nl}I wouldn't worry if it only steals food.{nl}
It bites on any wooden materials on military equipments and it also breaks medicine jars.{nl}It makes holes to tents.{nl}And it is not afraid of anything. It attacks people.
Ha! Now I am relieved!{nl}The materials and the tents have come and the equipments and supplies would come soon..{nl}Then we should just wait for carts.. carts? carts?!!{nl}
Ah, I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry, but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself, but I think I am gonna get scolded again.. Haha..
Adjutant General Pakelas
Ah, You must the tat famous.. Oh..It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}
Ah, carts..damn. Malt forgot them again..{nl}We have extra carts, but they need to be fixed so I should first check them.
Please check their status.{nl}Those soldiers should check them, so I am sorry..{nl}I will scold Bran.
What?{nl}These are the only carts that can function normally?
Damn. The materials and the equipments should come..{nl}Since I just can't wait, I should get some stems of Harming in the meantime.{nl}I feel dizzy already..
How should I scold Malt?
That's enough!{nl}I feel sorry to you.
Then, Can you help me?{nl}Please get some toe nails from Velwritgglers at Rajuma Crooked Road.
Our revelator is so kind.{nl}Isn't he?
Damn, it just grazed, but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.
It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
Does Truffle have mushrooms?{nl}Look at the horn closely. That is in fact a mushroom.
Isn't it strange that the mushroom grows from the head?
Now, it is completed.{nl}Please mix all ingredients that you gathered from Altar of Harmony at Ajidu intersection.
That was the place to purify divine water or divine objects that will be dedicated to Saule goddess before.{nl}Forget about the past. It is better to use that place for the best purpose now.
What's your impression of seeing the altar?{nl}I felt somwhat nostalgic by seeing it.
Anyways, the acidic liquid will be completed after mixing them!
With this acidic liquid, please melt the thorny vines.{nl}They are located on the upper side of Ajidu intersection.
I hope Vine Forest returns to it's look in the past.{nl}No birds come here anymore.
Vine Forest used be a beautiful forest once in the past.{nl}We, believers used to hold ritual ceremonies here.{nl}
After Bramble, the demons' lord, came to this forest, it turned out like this.{nl}I can't remember when's the last time that I heard the sounds of birds. I miss the old, beautiful forest.
I miss the old forest sometimes.{nl}I also miss when I used to listen to the words of Saules goddess.
Believer Birgis
There's nothing that we can't do with our religious faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't do, then that's because our religious faith is not big enough.
Believer Noyus
Supplies Officer
I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received the list of supplies that is needed, but look at the number of supplies here.{nl}I can't manage them myself.{nl}
I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need the grass called Jilgyung.
The people in charge must have forgot about the support.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
Wow, so fast.{nl}But that's not an end.{nl}If it would be done with Jilgyung, than I could have finished it myself.
Meat is perfect to cheer us up. Meat.{nl}The cows that grew by eating apples will be good, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try to hunt for Tinis that have similar taste.
The number of supplies is not the only reason that I am not acting quickly.{nl}Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, zigris are doing that..
This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
So.. We have eveything we needed..I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Wait..{nl}
Ah.. They are worse than those Vubbes. Damn!! The potion jars went all missing..{nl}Those zigris sometimes steal the objects that seem unique to them.{nl}
They are more than thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they take it away.
We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while.{nl}They will be scared to think about you.{nl}
Now we have everthing we needed.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}Now, I am relieved.
Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigrises.. I want to show them how scary I am.
There is a flag at the Zigris camp which Vubbes installed long ago.{nl}Now zigris are at the place.{nl}I don't care about that, more important thing is..{nl}
They just stole all the supplies that I gathered hard! I can't forgive them.{nl}They must know the pain. Please burn down the flag.{nl}I will check the supplies again!
Hahaha! Damn you Zigris!{nl}Understand now how scary I am!
Damn, I am confused.{nl}I have so many things to do, but the number of monsters is not decreasing..{nl}Don't you think so? I should do the job, but those monsters..
Forecastor Owl Sculptor
So you finally came here.
Before we get into a real action, we should try destroying the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't just get into real action right now.
You are indeed growing.
You are indeed the person I was waiting for.
Okay. then let's get into the real actions.{nl}You should awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.
I am sure you can do it.
Examiner Owl Sculpture
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.
Thanks.{nl}You woke me up.{nl}Are you read for the test?
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Good luck..
You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?
Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
You passed the first test.
Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
You passed the second test.
It's gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Forecastor Owl.
Please go to the forest again.{nl}The person waiting for you is there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the scupture toghther at the designated place.
Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please move forward.
You woke me up to take the test.
I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master, the one who will help you. {nl} I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl} I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
So did you understand the attributes? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies more easily.
How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.
Good to see you. I am the Archer Master. {nl} Do you know about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
Mastering this attribute will help your skills in combat.
Will is the force to create magic power. {nl} There is not a stronger weapon for a wizard than that.
Archers give arrow as a present but the enemies take it as death.
There are ones who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl} It means find something more valuable than your life.
A ranger's arrow does not aim at just one target {nl}
It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl} So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.
One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl} If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need.
There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn it. {nl} Also, you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.
What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, right? {nl} Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl} Please let the battle commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.
Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
Blackened boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
Others are violent as well, but Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
Jilgyung is all around here so you can easily find it.{nl}I will do other works first.
There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}8 big scoops will do.
We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's go steal the jars that Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
Monsters really like the Essences of Spirits.{nl}They become strong when they absorb the power.
If it goes wrong.. then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
Nice to meet you, follower of the Goddess. {nl} Do you know about learning attributes?
Welcome, you who follow the goal of the goddess.{nl}Do you know about the attributes' training?
Now do you understand what the attributes are? {nl} Acquiring attributes will help you to easily defeat the enemies. {nl}
Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl} How can you ignore the people seeking help in the name of the Goddess.
People are suffering in body and mind from the wounds of Medis Diena.{nl} They need our help.
I am sorry, but please find my colleague Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do research.
I don't know where he is gone.{nl}He will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I will be done when I find the rest of the research materials.
Thanks. I was thinking maybe Tontus may have swallowed it.{nl}I promise you that I will go back to the researchers' camp when you find me this.
I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.
So this is all? hmm..{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will go back to the researchers' camp.
Monsters will get no benefits by obtaining those research materials.{nl}But, there are many people claiming that they lost the materials. Isn't it strange?
You want to be our disciple?{nl}Do you know who we are?
We should ask for more when we are in the era like nowadays.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
Good. Good. This will be enough.
Go find the limes that the monsters ate now.
After finish making this, I am outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here so long.
Good. Go meet my partner at Garden of Poles with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits well like us.{nl}
I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some firewoods that are scattered on the ground.
Vincent
Ah, ah so you are the newcomer.{nl}Check the thing behind me and if the thing inside of it gets solidified, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Mausoleum?
You are very skillful as a starter.{nl}By the way.. do you know how we were able to survive in this world?
I am looking for the poles that were used in building the Mausoleum.{nl}If you see unique poles, please let me know.
Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zlugi ruins.
I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
It was a good study because of you.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. I feel angry about it.
Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for must be marked.
I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?
It is a real honor to be selected as a member of the research team, but I am afraid that I would make a mistake.
The man with silver hair requested me something, what was it?{nl}Was it blond hair?
Forecastor Owl
Necroventer has obstructed the road to thorn forest. {nl} you must defeat the Necroventer to go to the forest of thorns.
The Owl Sculpture with anger
Die all those who are resistant to Necroventer.
Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards..It's depressing.{nl}
If you are okay, can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him..{nl}And that will be a good experience for us.
Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!
I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes.. something good will happen.
Hm Hm, actually.. {nl}I am here to solve the problems.. no, I was called to server for the military.{nl}
You probably saw it when you came a while ago. Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient, but we have a solution.{nl}I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.
I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly..
Wow, it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly..
Okay.. When you pour this onto Thorny Bushes, they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew that..ah, no. I made that. I can guarantee it's effectiveness.
What a lovely Thorny Bus..{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying..
What was that? I thought we just needed to get rid of Thorny Bushes.{nl}It was tremendous!{nl}
Herb broker is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys are not good. Nothing to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets.. are you guys crazy to take those pets to dangerous battle field?
What is that defiant glare? {nl}You don't wanna accept that you are not skillful?
Okay. I like your attitude.{nl}But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. Then I will acknowledge your skill.
Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.
Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?
Good! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skill.{nl}Do not ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
Okay. You go back to Raimondas.{nl}Be confident.
Okay. Have you brought the evidence?
Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Do not forget.{nl}The newcomers these day.. I don't find any confidence in them..
By the way.. I don't see that hairy creature that you used to take with you.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morkos farm.
That monster looked like the monster you used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morcus farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you used to have.
Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If that is him, it's so pity.
Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.
No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...
Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...
Herb broker!! This is all because of the herb broker.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where is he, by the way?
It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, it's not that Spion should die.
Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{n}
Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.
I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.
