I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}You follow me too. If you could help us, that will really help us out.
Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the goddess' blessing too much.
I know many people are missing, but no one tries to find them.{nl}They don't even know those people even existed.
We should make some money when the world is in chaos.{nl}Ah, never mind.
Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the stone with vigor.{nl}
It's fortunate that you two are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the goddess bless you.
Good luck.
I will feel more comfortable if I do that myself, but my knee which was shot by an arrow before aches a lot.
If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Camp, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.
Due to the evil beings' trick, the protectors broke the stone plate which contained the rules of the Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the protectors and bring back the plate.
Those protectors are trying to break the stone lantern at the Mausoleum.{nl}Block them. They are out of control.
Everything at the Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.
The king's determination that was left only slightly made the protectors to remember protecting the stone plate only.{nl}That was so sad.
The rules of the Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.
My wound is deep, so please pass the object to me when you find it.{nl}Meet Kepect at Apvija Hills.
I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the great king's spell, you need to be qualified.{nl}You should also possess courage and wisdom to unleash the seal.
There's a white oak tree at Zeme Plateau.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.
This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.
With these fluids, I will make the stone to unleash the seal.{nl}In the meantime, please save Amalas at Pamirsit plateau.
You gotta get the one without poison.{nl}You may pass out for a while if you get addicted to it, so be careful.
Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for our generation to meet you.
It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one could obtain it.{nl}The chosen one should possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
Of course, our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
These are fluids that I've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after those fluids.
It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.
I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the key of the great king?{nl}
Okay. Find the map which indicates the location of the seal.{nl}There is also false information on the map so you should check many places.
This is something that should not be handed over to those demons.{nl}I don't know the exact location.
Nothing here.
But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map so check all those places.
You found it.{nl}The inheritance of Zachariel, the great king, has been waiting for you.
This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.
No antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}
We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
The Revelator is here?!Thanks god.{nl}I am a historian, Rexipher. I am studying on the Mausoleum.{nl}
We already have the most of the answers.{nl}But to get the last answer, I need your help.
There are things that only revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb..
It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is the blessing of the god.
Good.{nl}The next epitaph is at Shirnas Plateau. Let's go.
I wonder what they tried to protect by building the tomb.{nl}I want to see it myself.
Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne intersections.
The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.
It was dangerous.{nl}But, we can't stop.
What do I want to get from the Mausoleum?{nl}That's a secret.
Zachariel's journey is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.
The last epitaph is at Apati cliff.{nl}I hope Zachariel understands our truth.
Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.
Is that so..{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}
How about you bring us the teeth of Hogma?{nl}It's okay if it takes some time.
I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.
I feel reliable.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Ruins.
Explained about the writings on the epitaph.
Historian Odell
There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.
Are you looking for a person?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?
Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with such name on our list.{nl}Ask other people to see if there's someone who knows Rexipher.
I searched the list and asked other people..{nl}There's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be a help.
Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?
Moving around with the name, Rexipher, she must be very courageous.
Wait a min. I read it from a book.{nl}Rexipher is the lord of the demons who serves for the demon king, Baiga.
Using the name of a demon, that doen't look like a good intent.
Rexipher?{nl}Doesn't she have silver hair with robe on her body?
She is a crazy person controlling monsters.{nl}She made me like this and she also destroyed the altar which I used to research on.{nl}
Go to Cheses altar first. {nl}They are also aiming for Gedula altar too.
I blocked your way.. I'm really sorry. {nl}
We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We should go after Rexipher.
The seals that haven't been detroyed yet at the king's plateau will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you would have enough time to chase after Rexipher.
Please go to the Mausoleum.{nl}We should find out what Rexipher has in her mind.
I came here since Laulas' injury is severe.{nl}How did she unleash the seal?
Anways, Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the nearest Chedeque's altar. It is on the way to Keturka Entrance.
Ruklys was a traitor so his monument also received ordeals.{nl}After it was broken into five pieces, they all dissappeared.{nl}
I am trying to find one of them by using small trees at Balkonas wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from the monster, we will make an exploration stick to find it.
There's a piece below Secrus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach near.
TreeAmbulo that lives in Gaisra Hall likes to collect stone pieces.{nl}Maybe, the pieces from the monument could be there.
Hmm.. Let's see.
{nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.
We are the believers of Saule Goddess.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
If it weren't us, all of this forest will be covered with thorny bushes.
Human controlling monsters.. That's the first time I saw such thing.{nl}And why did she break the altars..
Please take care of those Tamas. I am getting disturbed by them.{nl}When I gain my conciousness, those tamas are all around me and glancing at me.
The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?
I guarantee you that Tama swallowed it. Do you want to bet?
It truly existed.{nl}Is it expensive? I don't know how expensive it is.
Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the small trees.{nl}How about we make money together?
I don't care what's it's use.{nl}But I am glad that it is precious.
You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!
I saw the fragements that are buried on the ground as I ran away from Tamas at the intersections. {nl}I am trying to negotiate with Raymond using those so can you bring me those?
It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.
It's enough.{nl}They will do something if I brought them to them.
Thanks.{nl}It was in the dream.
I will pray for the goddess to bless you.{nl}You should block him no matter what.
I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult alone.{nl}I hope I have a companion. Are you interested?
He is the traitor of the Kadumel's era and the owner of Tower of the Earth.{nl}He was regarded as the best swordsman even when he was young and lots of people followed him.
His greed was too much so he caused coup de ta.{nl}If the great merchant, Premier Eminent wasn't there, the the histroy could have changed a lot.
Ruklys learned from the same teacher that I used to learn from.{nl}That's why I understand what he wants to achieve and what's his objective.
We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is more like praising. I should rip it off.{nl}Carrying something that has praises about the traitor written on it may lead me to the prison.
The fourth epitaph is at Shiluma Altar and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve. {nl}Let's say farewell here since I should also check them myself from here.
[Can't read the rest since the epitaph is damaged.]{nl}

As I landed on this land as a bystander, I saw the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish the revolution,{nl}Lydian Schaffen also formed her forces and they still remain nowadays.
If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken long time ago when monsters swept on it.
But, I have the rubber copy.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.
Thanks. As promised, I will tell you about it.{nl}
But, I was ignorant at then.{nl}I too may had to concentrate on accomplishing my mission.
When you use this collecting device on those small trees, the fluids will be collected inside.{nl}Bring those to me when you collect them.
I feel so reliable. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Cabin. {nl}I will give you necessary tools so bring the rubber copies of them.
My tower that will stand towards the goddess Gabija may carry that answer with it.{nl}But, I won't ruin the task as my predecessors did.
When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
The third epitaph is at Kriakul Brook.{nl}Let's continue robber coyping with that epitaph.{nl}
I got my luggage back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}
Go to Pelena. {nl}On the way to it, there is the epitaph which you are looking for.
Let's see, it may take little time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I am concentrating?
Well done.{nl}It took little long because there was a small piece.
It's so cruel to be a traitor.{nl}He was a respected swordsman, but even the monument after his death was not in good status.
He even casted magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's so hard to find those pieces because of those monsters that were inflicted on that magic.
Ah, That's the object I ordered.{nl}It finally came.
Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbil pond.
Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry it.{nl}
It will be a plesant experience.
I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}Lizard Man on the way to Dumbal Pond would be good.
The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}Lizard Man will be good for the experiement since it is very fast.
The Lizard Man that you sent to us was really lively.{nl}Now, we are almost done.
The peak of this spell will be Incroberk.{nl}I will give you the stone to control minds so please bring me Incroberk.
Those Incroberks that you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}
The bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The Goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}
The monsters there are extremely dangerous so you be careful.
All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Statue of Goddess before you leave. {nl}
Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.
You have so much curiosity.{nl}Okay. Bring me the grass that only grows at Kriakul Stream.
Please use this stone to Lizard Man.{nl}After getting control of it, it will run to me.
The era of Kadumel was the period of turbulence.
Tyrant Kadumel, Premier Eminent who was renowned as the great merchant and the disciples of Maven..{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}
There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are many side stories of them as well.
When you use the stone to Incroberks, they will automatically come to me.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.
She is the most impressive Archer in the history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys who was a traitor and the great swordsman with an arrow.{nl}
That's why all archers want to purchase things that are related to her even if they are expensive.{nl}She is like the goddess to us archers.
There was a priest called Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the great cathedral. Anyways.{nl}
Maven lived for a long time and he had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
And when Lydia Schaffen got old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.
She learned all magics that were exisiting at then.{nl}She also built Magicians' Tower. She was so amazing.
Our old man always complains.{nl}Even if I give him the best things to him, he always complains.{nl}
I don't wanna help him since he always complains.{nl}I am sorry, but can you tell my feelings to the old man?
When he first came here, he had hard time adopting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him some food and made him some clothes..
How come Cahill didn't come here and how come you are saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?
Hey. Since you came, please do some errands.{nl}You see those lumbers over there? Please bring me ones that are fine among them.
Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..
What! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well.. that's okay..
Please give this crutches which I made myself to Cahill.{nl}Where was Cahill hurt his ankle..
Before I change my mind, get outta here.
Crutches from Moze..{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.
I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Wing Frogs near this camp.{nl}
I don't wanna know it's use.
Damn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.
Follower Domas
I am going to burn the thorny bushes that are blocking the road.{nl}Can you help me?
Please get me the ashes of Dunball first. {nl}There are many of them at Rustebi Woods.
There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous at Thorny Pole Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
Now is the time to defeat it.{nl}We spent long time finding it.
Flames will never catch on these thorny bushes here.{nl}I don't want to touch them due to it's vicious atmosphere.
You brought it well.{nl}I was worried that you would hurt, but I guess I didn't have to worry.
4 years ago, this forest was a normal forest.{nl}But, after Bramble came into deep into the forest, it turned out like this.
Who knew that they would use the power of our altar?{nl}I can't see the goddess.
Follower Bronews
I could survive because of you.{nl}I should warn other priests to be careful.
Priest Jurga
I can feel Bramble is suffering.{nl}He is getting paid for extracting all vigor from this land.
You're the Savior the Goddess sent. What an honor. {nl} Are you ready to fight Bramble?
You need to be prepared if you want to defeat Bramble. {nl} First, take this.
So it will be hard for Bramble to recover now.{nl}We can save the dying trees as well.
Try to hold it in even if it's dirty. {nl} This is the best I can do.
You found the revelation. {nl} Aren't you hurt? {nl}
Bramble. {nl} Poor thing trying to go against its fate.
The oldman of Andail Village
So you're the one who wanted to meet Goddess Saule. {nl} Do not worry about the pond. Our priests are preparing it. {nl}
The priest is located in Cerpe crossroads. {nl}I heard he needed the venom of Black Maize so try to get him that as a present.
We wouldn't have dreamed about the portal if it wasn't for you. {nl} You truly are the blessing of God.
Andail's village Priest
Isn't this the venom of the black maize? {nl} Thank you very much. {nl}
You can leave meeting Goddess Saule with me. {nl} Now that the diving pond is purified, we just need to solve the Obelisk.
Magic letters are carved on the Obelisk. {nl} But some letters were erased as the divine pond became contaminated. {nl}
If the letters are gone, we just need to write it back on. {nl} Now that you've collected the venom of Black Maize, we just need the sap of the oak tree.
We just need to restore the Obelisk to meet Goddess Saule.
Please bring that poison to the Village priest in Cerpe crossroads.
The dye is complete. {nl} Trace the pattern vaguely left in the Obelisk and draw a new one. {nl}
The Obelisk is in the Slepingas stream.
I'm sure God will be satisfied with you.
It's almost done. {nl} After completing the rituals to cleanse your body, you will be able to meet the Goddess soon. {nl}
Use this tranquilizer on the black maize and extract its poison. {nl} The Maize should be weakened for the tranquilizer to work.
Thank you so much! {nl}By the way, what was that vibration?
The disciple of Andail Village
You're the Revelator right? {nl}Upent is preying on the village so we can't hold the ritual right away. {nl}
I'm thinking of making Languid Herb bombs. {nl} Please bring me lazy flowers from the Narvas tracks.
It is safe where the Languid Herb bloom so do not worry.
Glad you're back safely. {nl} Didn't the monsters attack?
Please get the flower of souls in Dvyni swamp too. {nl} Languid flowers alone will not be so effective. {nl}
I hope we'll be successful this time.
I'll do the ritual right away if you defeat Upent.{nl}So, please get the flower of the soul.
That is enough. {nl} I'll send the materials to the elderly, so please go and get the explosives.
The headman of Andail Village
Explosives? Ahh. {nl} Go to the warehouse lot in the upper side of the village.
It's probably in the big container. {nl} It won't explode, so don't worry.
Don't worry, it's safe. It will not explode.
Was it a small container? {nl} I'm old and I guess I got confused. {nl} Normally, people would have burnt and disappeared without a trace but a Revelator surely is different.
God or Goddess, what you call her doesn't matter. {nl} Aren't we all one eventually? {nl}
Is it hard to understand? {nl} One day you will realize.
Here, this is Languid flower bomb. {nl} Take it to the cliff of Melagingas.
Now, hurry. {nl} We can finally end it this time.
This time, it can finally come to an end.
Hmm. So. The procedure is. {nl} Wash your body in the water and pray, then.. {nl}
It's too complicated so I'll explain it later.
Can you step on the Statue of the Goddess? {nl} It doesn't matter. Why do you ask?
It will be hard without Colli flowers' fluids because of rain.{nl}When would the rain stop.
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
Burn the thorny bushes that block Rustybe Dead Trees Region using this.{nl}Although it's raining, you will easily burn them.
Please move up a bit from Rustybe Dead Trees Region.{nl}It was a real honor to meet you, revelator.
You're the Revelator right? {nl}A very ominous voice is looking for you so please be careful.
Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see that ring, please bring it to me.
That ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.
You found the ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!
The priests are having hard time due to thorny bushes.{nl}How about you help them?
I will write down all the processes for you.{nl}How about you start by recharging mana of magic crystal?
Okay, show me that you can stand against those thorny bushes with your religious faith.{nl}You can't say you are the follower when you are weak like now.
I don't know if it's due to thorny bushes or vicious atmosphere, but.. {nl}This forest make people too depressed.
I believe in myself that one day this forest will be okay again.
Are you okay?{nl}I almost lost my conciousness due to that voice.{nl}Who is he anyways..
The atmosphere is becoming stronger and the priests are getting tired. It's bad.
Thanks.{nl}I wonder what would have happened without you.
As Merogg sorcerers are undertaking their rituals, I will give it a try.{nl}Can you take care of those sorcerers?
Thanks for your help.{nl}Now the demons won't be able to act freely.
I didn't know those demons would use Summon crystal.{nl}They may surround us.
I want to receive all the information about that magic field.{nl}Please be careful not to break the precious sample.
We would be able to find a way to use it.{nl}Those demons used our altar so we can use it too.
Believer Onute
They are waiting for Akon to be summoned.{nl}If you destroy all the magic fields along with Akon, they will be frightened.
Thanks.{nl}They would not be able to attack us easily now.{nl}
Thanks.{nl}The believers are distributed to their areas so find them and help them.
If you don't have any job to do here, then it will be better to leave this place asap.{nl}It's not good for a person who doesn't know how to purify stays here too long.
Saule goddess Quezon evil aura it is not willing to spread in the other forest. {nl} Therefore, thing we're here.
I am so angry to see those filthy demons walking around.
I gave up long time ago since I can't see an end to that vicious atmosphere.{nl}I just think of it as my destiny.
Now we just need to find out the plan of those Meroggs.{nl}Until then, please face that magician.
Saule goddess was so do not speak the absolute their presence. {nl} Ramyonsoyo that give me the world of confusion only without any reason.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
I am okay about the sample so just break it so that it won't activate.{nl}I am gonna take a look at it myself.
I get angry everytime I enter that Thorny Foresst.{nl}How could these dirty things happen in this divine forest of the goddess?
Help me. Meroggs are after me.{nl}When they are moving in a herd like that, I can't face them.
Good. {nl} Now, we're going to destroy the roots of Bramble.
Believer Samanta
Whenever I tried to purify the Thorny Trees fountain, those monsters attack.{nl}Is there some way to avoid them?
Monsters are becoming more violent as they enter deeper into the thorny forest.{nl}Maybe that's due to the vicious energy.
I can relax now and purify the fountain.{nl}Thank you so much.
I can rely on you.{nl}Please protect the altar until the fountain gets purified.
Put Merlog's saliva in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy aura of Bramble.
Bramble is recovering by embedding roots around the Thorn Forest . {nl} Cutting those roots will be very painful.
You can't let your guards down even if the Brambles weakened. {nl} It is the leader of the demons no matter how injured it is.
Now we'll make a full-scale attack on Bramble. {nl} I'll go in the Giliaii courtyard and watch on the Brambles first so follow me.
The most important roots in the Sviesa hills and Tankinta lot. {nl} Cut them both.
Even when all vicious energy is removed, this forest will be as it is.{nl}But, we will an end someday.
Believer Kazis
Somewhere in the single road Caracas has hidden Honeypin you can not but find. {nl} purification work has been delayed because of the monster.
You just need to activate the altar of purification.{nl}Without letting Honeypin know.
You are not hurt?{nl}I heard the Honeypin's wing sound, but I am relieved to see you are okay.
Bramble and revelation are in the depths of Giliaii courtyard. {nl} The roots for healing the scars have all been cut so it must be agonizing.
Do not forget to use stimulants every time you run out of breath. {nl} May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
Do not forget to use stimulants every time you run out of breath. {nl} May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
If you feel you are in danger, run away quickly.{nl}The ship is more dangerous due to the vicious atmosphere.
I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The goddess, Saule will guide me well.
Echart is the faithful protector of the Mausoleum.{nl}But, once it gets ruined, it never comes back to it's previous status.
The broken epitaph of the Mausoleum
The protector, Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbs Zachariel's rest.
The epitaph of the Mausoleum
The protector will be disturbance to you when the maigic that flows in the Mausoleum get disrupted.
The protector of the Mausoleum
Once the protector gets ruined, it can never come back to it's normal status.{nl}Only rest could sleep the protector.
Ruined protector of the Mausoleum
Anyone who distubes the king's rest, this place will be his grave.
I will rather choose to be destroyed by revelator than being polluted by vicious atmosphere.
Revelator's name is gone and only demons' names remain.{nl}You should protect yourself.
I am keeping my eyes on Bramble after receiving the goddess Saule's order.{nl}He is the source of all evil beings in this forest.
It was a real honor to meet you.{nl}For your future, I will pray to Saule Goddess.
Do not disturb Zachariel's rest
I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.{nl}I will complete the jewel of prominence here and help the goddess Gabija.{nl}
I hope the goddess stands still until then.
Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with flame steam.{nl}There is a flame steam with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
You should search for it hard.{nl}The flame steam is not clearly visible.
This is enough. Well done.
Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}
First, unleash the steam from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the steam will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that in the jar. Okay?
Don't worry. It won't explode or hurt you.
Hew.. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!
I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
We should succeed..
So this is the Jewel of Prominence.. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord, Bramble.
It's embarrassing but I am also tricked and captured, losing all my strength. {nl} Please destroy the magic circle imprisoning me.
The magic circle of confinement is located in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva lot. {nl}Please hurry.
Thank you for saving me. {nl}
I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun. {nl} Everything is just like how Laima has forseen.
Thank you. But this is not the only barrier imprisoning me in here. {nl} We've got to find the inspetor, Clymen, hiding in between the gap of dimensions.
Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.
Thank you. {nl} This much divine power would be enough.
Just a bit more. Please suppress the Magi.
It's his key. {nl} Please let me free.
Thank you in the name of Saule, the Goddess of the sun. {nl}
It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of Bramble. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}
But the Bramble is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the Bramble in the gateway with my followers and get the revelation back.
Show me the revelation. {nl} I'll show you its meaning.
If it's the divine power dwelling on the sacrifice items, then we can surely use it to find Clymen. {nl}
Lyliana
I really want to know how my family is doing but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl} I just ran out of the house and I regret it a lot.
I just feel sorry to my brother.
Old man of Andail village
God is looking after our village so our village has clear water and air. And there are no disasters here.
So finally the revelator has come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. I gues we can do it this time.
Aren't you the Revelator? {nl} So, what brings you to our village? {nl}
Goddess Saule? {nl} We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
The portal leading to Goddess Saule just won't open. {nl}I think it's all because the diving pond is contaminated.
Tanu in Zvelgian vacant lot has the purifying stone. {nl} That would be able to purify the pond.
Just like there are many demons, same goes for the Goddesses. {nl} The five Goddesses are just the ones who became well known.
Our village serves Goddess Saule who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot before through the portal but one day, the portal closed.
I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
When I gained my conciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
Scuptors should be careful not to exaggerate their skills.{nl}They should be humble to themselves.
It is a good sign that you, the revelator came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
Please come to our village.{nl}Villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
The god guides us to meet together.
Don't think it's a pain. We received a blessing.
Trust the god.{nl}We can be together in the tree.
We will be saved by being together.{nl}The god had told us to do that.
Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
That portal is the gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
Bramble, the lord of the demons can never be forgiven.
Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the believers at Gate Route.
Please be careful of the trick of the observer at Gate Route.
I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
It seems that rain won't stop. In fact, it rarely stopped.{nl}Do you think this is because of the vicious energy?
These thorny bushes just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's better than doing nothing.
Even if Bramble gets dissappeared, I think I am gonna stay like this for a while.{nl}Whole forest is covered with thorny bushes. They are so big.
So, you seem to live up to your reputation. {nl} Our people in the village are just cowards hoping the Goddess will take care of everything.
But, did you not see the young man of our village? {nl} I told him to ge see how the portal works but I have not heard back since then.
Thank you. {nl} The portal is in the Nugria Sanctuary.
Injured Villager
Thank you for saving me.
So you're the Revelator the Mayor spoke about. {nl} I'm fine so please check the portal of the Sanctuary.
The portal can be opened from the altar in Nugria Sanctuary
It does not work. {nl} That's a big problem. {nl}
That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.
Injuries are not that severe so don't worry. Please check the portal in the sanctuary first.
I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}First, the portal..
Ah, so you are the revelator!{nl}It's a real honor for us.
Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just quit the purification process.{nl}Saule has told us to do that.
We want to live quietly by serving Saule.
The statue of the protector of the Mausoleum
The rules of the Mausoleum are being ruined by the vicious being.
The statue of the protector
It is our mission to protect Zachariel who is in his rest.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs Zachariel's rest.
We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Mausoleum.
It is our mission to protect Zachariel who is in his rest.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs Zachariel's rest.
Wheelen! Oh, my faithful protectors..{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.
Venucelos is very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if his loyalty faces towards my enemies, he will be worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the Mausoleum will lose the leash with the king's name on it.

The proof of powerfulness! Such a beautiful words..{nl}Zachariel was proud to create the gigantic protectors.{nl}And he put the secret documents of the kingdom in those protectors so that the one who defeats them can get those documents.
The statue of the protector
Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
Broker between the life and death of humans. {nl} That's what Bokor is, if you ask.
You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
I can't see the head of the tree with long branches. Do you want me to get it for you?
Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl} We haven't had so many people come to town before.
Did the Goddess mention where she is in the dream of revelation?
Go ahead to Klaipeda. {nl} Commander Uska is waiting for you in the Central Plaza.{nl}
I heard the bishop also had a dream about the Goddess... And I think it has to do with it.
That girl. {nl} She just appeared in town some time ago. {nl}
I mean she didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl} She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food and this happened.
I mean the girl who was confined together with us last time. {nl} Do you think she has a family? It seemed like she can not speak at all. {nl}
If I was a parent, I probably would have gone around mad looking for my daughter. {nl} Parents nowadays are really irresponsible. {nl}
The girl did not speak at all. {nl} In addition to that, a young lady all grown up walking all the way to this remote village barefoot. Doesn't it seem strange?
Can we go home..
I want to go home soon..
Husband of refugee family
Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl} Would you mind visiting her?
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.
Accessory Merchant
Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the Goddess? {nl} I'm going to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}
If the armors protect you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope it would be useful for you.
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here. {nl}
Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}You are the person chosen by the eyes of Zachariel right?
Welcome.
Oh, seems like you have Yukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} I need a lot of those. Can you share some with me?
Thank you very much. {nl} I need these to treat the injured men in our village but I don't have enough.
I know you tried hard but I need some more.
I still need more Yukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} But I don't want to just take them from you. What about trading it with the potions I have?
Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
Yukopus and Kepas appear around the Miner's Village.
Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.
Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the Bless of Goddess be with you!
I am looking for medicines to cure wounded ones.
Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
Ordinary Man
This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
Bone fragments are seen in the well.
I'm furious and upset. {nl} If we got here earlier, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out ... {nl}
Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you return the keepsakes of my comrades?
It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all the food supplies. {nl} They took even our immediate food... Please use your strength to help us.
They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl} What do we do if we can't get back our food.. {nl}
Thank you. {nl} This will at least get us through the next few days.
Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more keepsakes that need to be retrieved. {nl} Think of my comrades who can't rest in peace.. {nl}
So please help us. {nl} If you get us back the rest of the keepsakes, we will provide compensation.
Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
We survived immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl} Could you help us out a bit more?
I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
Thank you. {nl} We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.
Fedimian Resident
I heard the wise man Maven who built the great cathedral left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess the great power.

Hey, if you are planning to keep on your journey, don't get close to the cursed city.{nl}It didn't even receive the blessing on the Medis Diena. You will turn into a stone if you get close to the city.
It's true that I am looking for the revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the revelator I am looking for.
There is The Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven, beyond Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.
The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on The Medis Diena, so I wonder if there are people still going there, but...{nl}There once was a great many of people going there to do various rituals.
They call the trail to The Great Cathedral, Pilgrim's Way.
Welcome. {nl} These items were hard to get.
Hawkers of Klaipeda
I came to pray in the distance Klaipeda. {nl} again as disaster does not occur, I like son between the army returns Moruchonhi.
Each time you come here along the husband on the Klaipeda, it is always prayer to come here. {nl} I was either God Beast of the day also defended to me was one wishes excluded get to.
Don't you ever think about going to the great cathedral.{nl}Besides the dangers due to it's breakages..
Yes. The Pilgrim's Way that must be passed when you wanna go to the great cathedral.{nl}Ah well.. the spirits of
Seal of Vubbe Tribe, Horn of Pantos, Heart of Merlog, HTeeth of Hogma. {nl} That is a lot! {nl}
The bootys that you've obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}How about we bet?
Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised/
I have buried a revelator once in the past.{nl}I was too arrogant with the trust from the goddess.
It's freightening to think that I turned out like this after all.{nl}I don't know whether I will bury one more revelator in the future.. You won't know either.
Are you proud of your skills to talk to me at this moment while the time is passing?
If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world..
Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes..
Without the blessing from the goddess, You must be near the goddess now.{nl}But lots of people can't do that anymore.{nl}
We can't revive the people who died by Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.
Innocent Spirit
Do not be surprised. {nl} There's something to give you before returning to the Goddess. {nl}
I want to apologize to my sister who left house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl} Can you find my sister and give her this necklace for me?
My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl} Where is my brother?
Innocent Soldier
You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on behalf of me.{nl}Somehow, I can't move.
Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer..
Errand Man
What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}
Wait a minute. No. No. {nl} Deliver this letter and I'll bump it. {nl} You just have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the letter.
Letter forme? What is this.. {nl}
Curse? I get it, I get it!{nl} I'll give you this money, so please tell him to not curse!
huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
Oh, I really thank you for last time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
But, uh, I'm too hungry and do not have energy to go back to boss. If {nl} If you have anything to eat, can you share some?
Oh, thank you so much! {nl} I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.
Chicks.. They remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't wanna see him even in my dreams.
Hm, Okay. I have accessories that will fit on that.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the monsters nearby.
Not yet?{nl}They will fit on you nicely.
Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.
The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Thank you. {nl} Our academia will not forget him too.
The revelator is lying here after he said such thing.{nl}If he survives after facing the nearby monsters for 2 minutes,
Next time, be careful when using public utilities. {nl} Well that's that and you have some great power.
Oh.. It's absurdity gets me at loss for words every time I look at it. {nl} Was is really this fragile..
I don't feel good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.
I will pray for that monsterl.{nl}If there are spirits who would listen to my prayer..
Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl} He also probably won't know my whereabouts too.
I can't leave here unless I complete the mission..
He is so stupid. {nl} He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than getting on each other's nerves. {nl} Hmm. Maybe I belittled myself too much.
Don't you act like you know me anymore! {nl} It not my fault. That's the one who's bad!
Are we there yet? {nl} I think we need to eat something to regain strength.
Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.
Cyrenia Odell
Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?
Ah? Woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release you as promised so make her alive.
Sincerity is our strength. {nl} There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the goddess.
I think being confined in there caused my throat and now my throat hurts. {nl} But what about the girl who was together? Where did she go?
Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl} We were more than glad to see you back then.
The goddess must have sent you.{nl}If that's not it.. we already.. It's too scary to think about it.
It was horrible in captivity. {nl} Vubbes come and smell us.. {nl} and make us dig here and there using pickax..
Rexipher .. he would have been really Asmodian?
You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl} But I have a question for you.
Healing magic. {nl} Can people easily do it?
But listen to me my story. {nl} When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}
But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl} Even the wound is gone. {nl}
Amazing huh? I make her a flower ring if we meet again. {nl} But I don't know where she's gone to.
Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
Strange Sack
Found a letter in the sack
The letter in the sack
Receiver: Drashoes{nl}Address: Virdului Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the tree with long branches that you ordered.
400 years would have passed by when this revelation reaches you. {nl} Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding the revelation. . {nl}

As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of Rimgaudis, the first Paladin. {nl} if you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}
The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
Three demon Kings and the demon leaders who follow them. {nl}Giltine is the one who controls all of them. {nl}
All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl} The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of human race. {nl}
I am a very fatal existence for them as I can see all of this. {nl}That's why Giltine will try to revert me to the world's waters. {nl}
Also, they will extend their evil powers to the Goddesses who go against their will. {nl}
But disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}And it means that the hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}
Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl} Find her back the light from the colorful valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.
The revelation of crystal mine
Dear Savior, {nl} in order for me to regain my whole appearance and stop the demons, {nl} you must find all the revelations hidden in the axis of all times. {nl}
But only you and I can save the world. {nl} I will wait for you in the highest gardens

Now take the unsealing stone and go to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}Student of Gustas will teach you how to release the seal there.
Were you not guided yet?{nl}It's the student of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.{nl}It is made to let only the chosen one enter.
Ask the mayor for directions to Gele Plateau. {nl}I will sent the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you.
The high gardens that the Goddess mentioned must be referring to the Gele Plateau. {nl}I heared the Paladin Master is there to keep a long term promise.
If you ever fight against us Rodeleros, better be careful of your legs. {nl}Swords pop out from below the shield. {nl}
The simplest is the strongest. {nl}If you want to study the roots of everything, take the path of Elementalist.
Go straight down the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.{nl}Go further into the right from the Srautas Gorge and you'll be able to get to Gele Plateau.
The Paladin Master is in Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get there by riding the cable car.
It is a device that the first Paladin set in preparation for the invasion of the demons. {nl}Many of it are placed to cover the whole of Nefritas Cliff. {nl}
You need to find Goddess Saule..{nl}The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation must refer to the stream beginning at the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.
This is the holy weapon used to fight against Gesti in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}It has been handed down from since the first Paladin.
Go. Tenet Cathedral is in Tenet Garden.{nl}Be sure to stop the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
Go find Gesti. {nl}Tenet Cathedral is in Tenet Garden.
There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.
You need to use the cable car to go from Srautas to Leaf Veil Plateau. {nl}I heard people used to hang baskets on ropes in the past. {nl}Well the cable cars are scary enough for me.
I came to protect the diving land from the demons. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is also in Gele Plateau. It surely must be a big problem. {nl}
I'm worried about my brother in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}I hope nothing happens to him.{nl}
We have to stick with the dolls left. {nl}Everyone's lives are at stake in Nefritas Cliff and I can't complain about this, right?
And if you're talking about Rukas Plateau, that place isn't worthy of research so it's been a while since we pulled out.
Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.
Bring the Crystal and find students of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge. {nl}They will teach you about the seal.
The Netherbovines are causing trouble again? {nl}As long as the Rodeleros are here, no monster can set foot here.{nl}
I used to live in the woods but I came here to do what I had to. {nl}I will do whatever that can be of help.
Physical enhancing magic is a profound and mysterious field. {nl}If you make good use of it, you can easily identiry your friends or enemies.
If the seal is released, you must go to the next seal in Ramstis Ridge.
Death may be the price I pay for my sin. {nl}Even if it is the curse of the demons, it is still a sin I've made.
I don't want to.. die like this.. {nl}Mother..
Wait. Isn't the the eye of Succubus? {nl}Oh my. How did you get that.. Can I take a look?
I've heard about the eyes. {nl}Succubus envied the necklace with the blessings of Cathedral so she put it in her eyes. {nl}
As you know, I may be an aspiring Elementalist? {nl}I can turn that back into a necklace. {nl}
Done. {nl}Do you know about the five necklaces of Mayvern?{nl}
It was created to remind people of the 5 sins. {nl}Though Naktis made it look like a curse on the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}
Looks like the necklace belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, teachings of Mayvern would have been left as a curse.
Actually, I want to go to Kvailas Forest. {nl}I want to see the source of evel with my two eyes.
Thank you. The blacksmith in Klaipeda sells the tools. {nl}But before that, stones in Stele Road are known for their fine quality so I ask of your favor.
Done. Please place this in the entrance of Underground Mausoleum in Zachariel Crossroad. {nl}Will this be enough commfort.
Hmm. You're really good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
Please be careful. {nl}A dark aura similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thron Forest. {nl}Especially the Kavilas Forest.. I have sharp ears for things like this..
The Necroventer that occupied Kule Peak is gone. {nl}Kule Peak will be peaceful again.
It's preparation for releasing the seal of Tiltas Vallye. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries. {nl}Please handle it with care.
This is it. {nl}Bring the Release Crystal to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}Students of Ramstis will be welcome you there.
The day for the Great King's legacy finding its true owner has come. {nl}Hurry, go to the students of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.
The teacher is poisoned and can't breathe. {nl}Quickly borrow antidote from others in Akmens Ridge.
I had no idea about Rukas Plateau. {nl}What are they trying to by releasing the seal? {nl}
Follow the road on the right and go to Cobalt Forest. {nl}Our town priest is waiting for you.
When you have all materials ready, combine it in Ershike altar.
The evil force was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you get rid of Bramble.
The evil force of Kvailas Forest is becomeing stronger but our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I hope you can help us. {nl}
Maybe the source of evil of Kavilas Forest has become the forest itself. {nl}Though I hope this is just an idel fear.
It will come to and end when the evil force deep inside Kavailas Forest is removed. {nl}It's a pity everyone is chasing only what's right in front of them.
Kvailas Forest is the worst. {nl}The evil force is at high and even your lives are at stake.
I miss my family in Cobalt Forest. {nl}And.. I want to apologize to my brother for the fight we had.
I remember singing and playing the the streams of Cobalt Forest
Can you tell it to the elderly in Vieta Gorge? {nl}Just go a little upward to the left.
The most important root must be somewhere in Kvailas Forest. {nl}Maybe we've going going around too much. {nl}Cutting off that root will reduce the forces of this forest.
I knew it was the poison of Evonipons. {nl}Its the only poison this strong.
Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe. {nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.
Is the antidote ready yet? {nl}That's terrible. He is getting worse.
Evonipon sure are vicious. {nl}We need to hunt it down before it cause more damage.
Oh is it antidote? {nl}Thank you very much. I will let him take it right away. {nl}
If it weren't for you, many workers could have lost their lives for nothing. {nl}I will report about this to Sir Uska. {nl}Truly.. You were sent by the Goddess!{nl}
A monster in the Owl Grave is a fair bet for you. {nl}Isn't it?
Chaparition of Escanciu Village took a lot of lives. {nl}Please defeat that monster in the name of the Goddess.
I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
It's going for a killing spree of the monsters in the Owl Grave. {nl}Around 40 of them? I bet that you can't make it.

Denoptik is trying to control the contaminated guardians. {nl}Annihilate them so that the guardians will not fall in its hands.
Thank you in the name of the Goddes! {nl}Please get rid of the filthy Cockatrice first that are spreading diseases.
Get your hands on the demons a bit then use the power of barrier to extract the soul. {nl}Then, you get rid of the soul. Would you give it a try?

The plan is to transform into a demon and confuse them. {nl} Please collect Pondel and Pond's clothings first.
Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}You must get rid of those demons.
I'm tired. I want to rest. {nl}I just need a lilttle time so can you take care of the demons around?
Kill whenever you see it. {nl}Only then our brothers can feel safe to protect the Church.

My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Get rid of the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
I am here and all over the world. {nl}I am collecting fragments of my soul which was torn into pieces long ago.
Where are my other pieces..
I am Demon Lord Houberg. {nl}Helga Sercle torn up my soul and a part of me is in the barrier of this tower, {nl}and the rest was spead in the world.
You still have business left?
Altars here are defensive devices againt Mausoleum intruders. {nl}It was built a long time ago so it should be activated again {nl}but no one knew how. {nl}
But the seal in Rukas Plateau was the answer. {nl}The altar will not function if it is destroyed {nl}but if we get to activate it before that..

)} {nl} If you have time, Please tell our troops to assemble.{nl}If you don't want to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.

Vubbe Figther is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
We should check by rubbing Hallowventer's wooden coals.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negibas Fields.
We can suppress the vicious energy if the magic of the tomb get unleashed.{nl}I need the activating stone that is located inside the protector.
It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my conciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?
It mya be better for Gabiy to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a people that we can ignite light on. Let's go.
Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl{nl}
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
If you are a true revelator, you can find the divine secret at the end of this paper.
The space movement magic field will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters wont't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for Demon's power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was prisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.

The reason why he was prisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
Antares was researching for a long time on the flow of the demon's power.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere.
This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the barrier device.
A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magics in case something happens.{nl}There was a magic written on Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infro Rocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that does't mean I lost my knowledge.
Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong when Antares was exploded a while ago.
Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
And me.. I feel dizzy..
If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to stabilize it fully, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to lab room.
Good! We can activate the device now.
You..are the revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Magicians' Tower.
Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.
There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.
This is then entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all the power somehow.{nl}
I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are the last hope of us. Let's go it.
Gabija had not disappeared herself.{nl}To protect the tower from demons, she just could not appear.{nl}
Agailla Flurry's is not found is successor, I heard and was borne away instead. To refer it's in order to ensure that a {nl} something important .. I don't know exactly.
I was sealed when my spirit is ripped off by high class demon.{nl}Please get rid of Infrorotor for me. I promise you that I will not be burden to you.
Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.
Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
Please go to Viesa's Altar.{nl}I will follow you.
It's either Rexipher destroying the altar, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
Looks like the necklace and collection belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, teachings of Mayvern would have been left as a curse.
Let's give up on this and move to the big transportation magic field instead.
The Asmodian attacked the tower is not the first time, but did Mase Long earthquake up here. Thanks to {nl}, and whether they are by but Gabija disappeared in the world?
That was a trap.{nl}It seems that they read every movements of us.{nl}
There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it would be little late, let's give up on the magic field and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.
The protective barrier device is on the left end of his hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs right after we activate the device.
The protective barrier device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It seems okay yet.
Good!{nl}There wouldn't be more monsters now.{nl}
Soon Let's go to the next floor.{nl}Gabija is awaiting us.{nl}
It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
We are the believers of Saule Goddess.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.{nl}I will complete the jewel of Prominence here and help the goddess Gabija.{nl}
Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with flame steam.{nl}There is a flame steam with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
You should search for it hard.{nl}The flame steam is not clearly visible.
This is enough. Well done.
Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}
First, unleash the steam from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the steam will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that it the jar. Okay?
Don't worry. It won't hurt you or expode.
Hew .. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominece!
I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
So this is the Jewel of Prominence. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord, Bramble.
I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun.{nl}Everything is just like how Lamia has forseen.
It's true that I am looking for the revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the revelator I am looking for.
Welcome. {nl} These items were hard to get.
I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
This place is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
We came here from the Vubbes' attack.{nl}But, This place seems to be not safe.
The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
Alright, I will tell the troops to assemble

I heard the monsters are moving in herds outside Klaipda.{nl}Instead of defeating them by once, it will be better to learn my skills.
I think, these words are indicating a very dangerous monster.{nl}Don't you think we should eliminate it?

I feel happy to see them being defeated.{nl}But, I think i need more research on it.

I feel relieved to have you beside.{nl}I feel that the fact that Laima has chosen you is very fortunate.
Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
There are many things to protect so we should not irritate those demons and defeat them quietly.{nl}I feel so relieved to have you, revelator.

You are easily exposed to enemies' attacks when you are using a bow.{nl}So my strategy is to use anything such as a shield or a stone to protect myself.
